LONDON 1996-08-26|||B-LOC O
NWE oil products were mixed on Monday but markets were becalmed because of a public holiday in the United Kingdom , traders said .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC I-LOC O O O O
Gasoline prices were notionally unchanged from Friday despite sagging NYMEX numbers , with the arbitrage window to the U.S. considered closed for the moment .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O
Eurograde barges were offered at $ 207 fob ARA for Amsterdam-Rotterdam barrels , and at $ 206 for full ARA material .|||O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O
" There is no market at the moment , " one Rotterdam trader said . "|||O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O
Maybe sentiment is a little bit weaker but prices have not changed . "|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Outright gas oil prices were notionally softer as the NYMEX heating oil contract headed lower , and following news that the Indian Oil Corp ( IOC ) had issued a tender to buy only 120,000 tonnes of high speed diesel for October .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG O B-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Asian traders had earlier expected an IOC tender for around 400,000 tonnes .|||B-MISC O O O O O B-ORG O O O O O O

Fuel oil markets were also listless .|||O O O O O O O

CLEVELAND 1996-08-26|||B-LOC O
Brush Wellman Inc said Monday that 10 of 24 lawsuits involving chronic beryllium disease have been dismissed since July 1 .|||B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
The leading U.S. beryllium producer said in a conference call it has traditionally been pro-active regarding the workplace disease , a lung ailment which can affects a small percent of people whose immune systems are susceptible .|||O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
The company was responding to an article in Sunday 's New York Times .|||O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG O
He said the article largely reiterated information about the suits and the disease which had previously been made public via Securities and Exchange Commission filings and annual reports .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG O O O O O
" Brush Wellman has been a leader in dealing with health and safety issues ( related to chronic Beryllium disease ) for nearly 50 years , " he said . "|||O B-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
The company is " vigorously defending " the remaining four suits filed by former and current Brush Wellman employees , he said .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O O O O O
After a delayed opening , the stock was off 1-1/2 to 18-7/8 .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O

Chelsea makes political debut on Clinton train trip .|||B-PER O O O O B-PER O O O
Chelsea , 16 , was at President Bill Clinton 's side as he rode the rails through parts of West Virginia , Kentucky and Ohio , and was introduced at every stop .|||B-PER O O O O O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC I-LOC O B-LOC O B-LOC O O O O O O O O
She even worked ropelines , shaking hands with excited fans .|||O O O O O O O O O O O
Hillary Rodham Clinton saw her husband and daughter off on the trip in Huntington , West Virginia and then went on to Chicago to begin a rigorous Democratic Convention schedule .|||B-PER I-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC O B-LOC I-LOC O O O O O B-LOC O O O O B-MISC I-MISC O O
She has to go back to school . "|||O O O O O O O O O
The president 's daughter is going into her senior year of high school at Sidwell Friends School , a private school in Washington .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG O O O O O B-LOC O
McCurry said Chelsea has asked to go on the train trip and attend the convention where her father will be renominated , but said her exposure did not signal the start of a new political career .|||B-PER O B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Chelsea " is a very poised young lady , but she 's not that much interested in politics , " the spokesman said .|||B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

Dutch closing share market report .|||B-MISC O O O O O
AMSTERDAM 1996-08-26|||B-LOC O
" It was always going to be a tough day with participation so low .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
But the only thing really worrying the market was the bonds , and that dragged us lower , " one dealer said .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Stocks were down across the board , with Dutch PTT topping the volume list and closing down 1.90 guilders at 58.70 .|||O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O
IHC Caland reported first half results well under forecasts on Monday and the shares suffered as a result .|||B-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
They were trading unchanged just before the release of figures but closed 2.40 guilders down at 80.70 after it reported net profits of 34.9 million guilders against 36.6 million last year and estimates ranging from 37.5 to 47.2 million .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
IHC also forecast post tax earnings rising 21 percent for the full year .|||B-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O
But the rally was short-lived and Stork ended just 0.20 up at 51.00 guilders .|||O O O O O O B-ORG O O O O O O O O
-- Amsterdam Newsroom +31 20 504 5000|||O B-ORG I-ORG O O O O
PARIS 1996-08-26|||B-LOC O
Former businessman and soccer boss Bernard Tapie said that he would give up his seat in the National Assembly by Wednesday , the day a film by Claude Lelouche in which he stars opens in France .|||O O O O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O B-LOC O
" Just about , " he told Europe 1 radio when asked whether he had sent his letter of resignation to Assembly speaker Philippe Seguin .|||O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG O B-PER I-PER O
A Seguin spokeswoman confirmed that no letter or call had yet been received .|||O B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O
Tapie , 53 , was resigning just ahead of expected government action to eject him from the Assembly following a finding by the Supreme Court that he was bankrupt and thus ineligible for public office for a five-year period .|||B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Tapie , the target of a blizzard of legal actions over his now-destroyed business empire and the Marseille soccer team he once ran , has a starring role in Lelouche 's " Homme , femmes : mode d'emploi " ( Men , women : instructions for use ) .|||B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
He plays a power-hungry lawyer in the movie described as " a tender and cruel comedy " by Lelouche , who is making his 35th film .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER O O O O O O O O
" I have paid too dearly for mixing two careers , " Tapie said . "|||O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER O O O
In France , you cannot be a film artist and a national politician at the same time .|||O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
That is why I will no longer be deputy by the time the film opens . "|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
The French procedure was expected to be completed before October 2 , when the National Assembly is to reconvene after a summer break , but the European procedure was expected to take longer .|||O B-MISC O O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O O O O O O
Tapie 's lawyer has said he intends to appeal to the European Court of Human Rights in an effort to prevent or delay the loss of his European seat .|||B-PER O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O
But such an appeal , even if the court were to accept the case , which it is not obliged to do , would not suspend enforcement of the French judgement against him .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O O O
Tapie faces a probable spell in prison after he loses his parliamentary immunity , since two appeal courts have confirmed jail sentences of eight and six months against him for tax fraud and rigging a soccer match .|||B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
He is appealing in both cases to the Supreme Court .|||O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O

PARIS 1996-08-26|||B-LOC O

The new pact expires on September 3 .|||O O O O O O O O

-DOCSTART-|||O
Dutch co-operative bank Rabobank Nederland BA 's net profit growth might slow to less than than 10 year percent in the second half of 1996 , executive board chairman Herman Wijffels said on Monday .|||B-MISC O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER O O O O
The unlisted bank earlier announced a 1996 interim net profit of 853 million guilders , up 21.5 percent on the 702 million guilders reported in the first half of 1995 .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
He said second-half profit growth would depend on customer demand for loans , which was already easing , and the performance of financial markets , which were strong in the first half and boosted securities , trading and underwriting income .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Maybe it will be in single-digits , " Wijffels told Reuters .|||O O O O O O O O B-PER O B-ORG O
Rabobank 's net profit was 1.43 billion guilders in 1995 .|||B-ORG O O O O O O O O O O
But Wijffels was unable to quantify second half investment to improve and extend domestic and offshore services .|||O B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

Thai PM proposes Sept 18 for no-confidence debate .|||B-MISC O O O O O O O O
BANGKOK 1996-08-26|||B-LOC O
Thai Prime Minister Banharn Silpa-archa on Monday proposed September 18 as the date for parliamentary debate on an opposition no-confidence motion accusing him of incompetence .|||B-MISC O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
The opposition motion against Banharn accuses him of being incompetent , lacking ethical leadership and alleges his administration is corrupt .|||O O O O B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
His critics allege he may be attempting to delay the debate .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O
Banharn has denied the accusations and said he is ready to clear himself in parliament .|||B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
This has nothing to do with the accusation that I am trying to escape the debate , " Banharn told reporters after meeting coalition partners .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER O O O O O O O
Political infighting within Banharn 's Chart Thai party has raised doubts whether he can hold his supporters together and defeat the opposition motion , political analysts said .|||O O O B-PER O B-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
September 18 is regarded as tentative because we still have not received the order to fix it on the agenda , " said an official at parliament 's agenda section .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
The last no-confidence debate against Banharn 's coalition in May was won by the government .|||O O O O O B-PER O O O O O O O O O O

FOCUS - Eurobourses end mixed but London recovers .|||O O B-ORG O O O B-LOC O O
Leonard Santorelli|||B-PER I-PER
LONDON 1996-08-27|||B-LOC O
Stocks in London started the week badly after a three-day weekend , slipping 0.3 percent , but bargain-hunters later moved in and the FTSE index recovered most of the lost ground to end only just in negative ground .|||O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Tuesday 's patchy showing in London followed a string of records last week , culminating in Friday 's trading high of 3,911 , fuelled by a wave of European interest rate cuts .|||O O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O O O
Shortly after the report appeared showing the confidence index rising to 109.4 in August from a revised 107.0 in July , Wall Street relinquished virtually all its morning gains .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC I-LOC O O O O O O O
" Treasuries remain very sensitive to any indication of a strong economy and we 're still in that summer doldrum period of light trading , " said Alan Ackerman , market strategist at Fahnestock & Co . "|||O B-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER O O O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG O O
Consequently , stocks and bonds are both subject to rapid swings . "|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Frankfurt was the one bright spot in Europe .|||B-LOC O O O O O O B-LOC O
Floor trading ended up 0.25 percent and the computerised IBIS index climbed nearly 0.4 percent , given a push by the performance of chemical shares . "|||O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
The market is trading 100 percent on fundamentals at the moment as interest rate fantasy disappears -- it 's all company news , " said one trader .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
French shares ended slightly down amid growing unease about a difficult autumn for the government which also weighed on the franc , dealers said .|||B-MISC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Bond prices were weaker and the franc was quoted at 3.4210 per mark for the first time since August 13 as worries about the government 's autumn budget and a weak U.S. currency lifted the mark and squeezed French investments .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O B-MISC O O
The dollar , which dropped sharply on Monday because of jitters over the Japanese Tankan survey , weakened further in quiet trading but regained losses to end the day close to Monday 's levels .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC B-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
" Besides the Tankan , there 's nothing really until the U.S. jobs numbers next week , " said a UK bank corporate dealer . "|||O O O B-ORG O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O O
There is still the summer malaise hanging over the market . "|||O O O O O O O O O O O O
Foreign exchange markets regard the Tankan report as an important indication of the country 's future monetary policy direction .|||O O O O O B-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
If it points to weakness in the economy , the report will help the dollar regain some lost ground as speculation of a near-term rise in Japanese interest rates will evaporate .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O O O O
The Japanese discount rate is currently at a record low of 0.5 percent .|||O B-MISC O O O O O O O O O O O O
The dollar was also pressured by the mark 's strength against European currencies amid renewed concerns over Europe 's economic and monetary union ( EMU ) timetable .|||O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O B-MISC O O O
CURRENCIES|||O
STOCK MARKETS|||O O
The Financial Times-Stock Exchange index of 100 leading British shares ended 1.8 points lower at 3,905.7 .|||O B-MISC I-MISC I-MISC O O O O B-MISC O O O O O O O O

More hostages freed from hijacked Sudanese plane .|||O O O O O B-MISC O O
STANSTED , England 1996-08-27|||B-LOC O B-LOC O
A spokesman for Stansted airport said that the unidentified hijackers were demanding to see a British-based member of the Iraqi Community Association , called Mr Sadiki , and that police were trying to trace him .|||O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG O O O B-PER O O O O O O O O O O
The hijackers started to release people for the Airbus plane in batches of 10 , starting with women and children , in what police described as a " controlled release " .|||O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Later they said the number of passengers released from the plane had reached 80 .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
-DOCSTART-|||O
Edna Fernandes|||B-PER I-PER
Famous names like Tarmac Plc , Costain Group Plc and ARC , a unit of conglomerate Hanson Plc , have all been targeted .|||O O O B-ORG I-ORG O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG O B-ORG O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O
They walk around with mobile phones and camera equipment , they communicate and gather support for demos via the Internet -- we 're talking about a highly sophisticated organisation . "|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O O O O O O O O O O
One road protestor under the codename Steady Eddie told construction journal " Building " earlier this year , " If it comes down to full-scale economic warfare , we will aim to drive them out of business . "|||O O O O O O B-PER I-PER O O O O B-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Costain 's contract to build the controversial Newbury bypass , which runs through a conservation area , has led to violent protests delaying building , bomb threats , staff intimidation and picketing of chief executive Alan Lovell 's home .|||B-ORG O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER O O O
But it 's when it gets to the ( employee ) families -- that it goes across the line . "|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Other larger activist groups include Earth First , The Land is Ours , Alarm UK and Road Alert .|||O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG O B-ORG I-ORG O B-ORG I-ORG O
The groups have targeted specific projects like the Newbury bypass and the M3 motorway through Twyford Down in the southern county of Hampshire .|||O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O B-LOC O O B-LOC I-LOC O O O O O B-LOC O
Graham Watts , chief executive of the Construction Industry Council , said : " I do n't think many firms involved in tendering for sensitive projects realise the impact environmental activity has on the cost of running a project .|||B-PER I-PER O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
There 's no doubt it 's a big issue now . "|||O O O O O O O O O O O O
He says the damage comes in two forms : " Tangible -- in the form of extra costs , additional security , threats to staff and the more intangible damage caused by negative publicity . "|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Watts said the cost of protesting can be heavy once the company is locked into a contract .|||B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
" I do often hear on the industry circuit of tales where the company tenders at low margins and the demonstrations which follow means they are running the project at a loss . "|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
" It was called the " First Battle of the Newbury bypass ' , " said ARC 's Harding .|||O O O O O O B-MISC I-MISC I-MISC I-MISC I-MISC I-MISC O O O O B-ORG O B-PER O
" We had 300 Earth First protestors invade and occupy our site .|||O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O O
Hundreds of thousands of pounds ( dollars ) of damage was done in one day .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Plus there was the knock-on cost of lost production and extra security in future . "|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
" When talking to Tarmac about the M3 link ( through Twyford Down ) they made it fairly clear that their risk assessment methods have been changed and now involve a very clear environmental risk analysis . "|||O O O O B-ORG O O B-LOC O O O B-LOC I-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Harding says others have done the same . "|||B-PER O O O O O O O O
As a result of eco-terrorism we are looking at controversial jobs more closely to see if the profit margins are wide enough to cover things like extra security . "|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
For an industry already suffering from razor-thin margins , overcapacity and stagnant demand , eco-terrorism is the latest bizarre twist in the construction sector 's tale of woe .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

London Carnival ends in high spirits .|||B-MISC I-MISC O O O O O
LONDON 1996-08-26|||B-LOC O
London 's annual Notting Hill Carnival , the largest in Europe and second in the world only to Rio , ended peacefully on Monday with an estimated 800,000 revellers singing and dancing the day away in high spirits .|||B-LOC O O B-MISC I-MISC I-MISC O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Police said they made 30 arrests and there were two stabbings .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O
But there was no repeat of the ugly scenes that used to scar the street festival , and police praised the crowds over the two days of festivities as good-natured .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Around 400 police were wounded in riots in 1976 when the carnival , now in its 31st year , acquired its darker reputation from which it is now only slowly recovering .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Shopkeepers still board up their windows and many residents leave town for the weekend , but for four or five years there has been no disorder and relatively little crime .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

Indonesia newspaper reports central bank scandal .|||B-LOC O O O O O O
JAKARTA 1996-08-27|||B-LOC O
Indonesia 's central bank suffered seven billion rupiah ( $ 2.9 million ) in losses resulting from fake transactions , the Jakarta Post reported on Tuesday .|||B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O O O O
The newspaper said it was the central bank 's first public scandal in its 43-year history .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
The paper said five people had been arrested and police were looking for two more suspects .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
-DOCSTART-|||O
NORTHAMPTON , England 1996-08-27|||B-LOC O B-LOC O
Seve Ballesteros and Colin Montgomerie are divided on whether Jose Maria Olazabal should be allowed to return to the European PGA Tour using a motorised cart to transport him around the course .|||B-PER I-PER O B-PER I-PER O O O O B-PER I-PER I-PER O O O O O O O B-MISC I-MISC I-MISC O O O O O O O O O O O
" If the ( Tour 's tournament ) committee decides to change the rule I would not be against it , " said Ballesteros , Olazabal 's compatriot and Ryder Cup captain .|||O O O O B-MISC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER O B-PER O O O B-MISC I-MISC O O
But commitee member Montgomerie said it could set an unhelpful precedent . "|||O O O B-PER O O O O O O O O O
You 've got to have a rule for everybody and I do n't think it 's feasible . "|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
The use of carts is generally prohibited in the professional game , and if Olazabal is allowed to use one in Bordeaux , he might then request one for the qualifying tournaments for next year 's Ryder Cup .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC I-MISC O

He had been in charge for six months .|||O O O O O O O O O

SOCCER - BALL RESIGNS AS MANCHESTER CITY MANAGER .|||O O B-PER O O B-ORG I-ORG O O
MANCHESTER , England 1996-08-27|||B-LOC O B-LOC O
Former England midfielder Alan Ball resigned as manager of first division side Manchester City on Monday night , the club said .|||O B-LOC O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O O O
Ball , appointed in July 1995 , was unable to prevent City being relegated from the premier league last season and his record read 13 wins , 14 draws and 22 losses in 49 games .|||B-PER O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
They have lost two of their three matches so far this season .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Club secretary Bernard Halford said in a statement : " The chairman and Board would like to place on record their appreciation of his endeavours and efforts whilst in his period of office and wish him well in the future . "|||O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O B-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

Graham Gooch , the 43-year-old former England captain , is to continue playing county cricket for at least another season , his club Essex announced on Tuesday .|||B-PER I-PER O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG O O O O
Opener Gooch 's decision comes towards the end of a season in which he has underlined his consistency by becoming the leading scorer in Essex 's history , beating Keith Fletcher 's aggregate of 29,434 .|||O B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG O O O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O
Gooch , who retired from test cricket after the 1994-95 tour of Australia but is now an England selector , is seventh in this season 's first-class averages with 1,429 runs at 64.95 , having hit five centuries and one double century .|||B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Essex secretary-general manager Peter Edwards said : " He is a remarkable batsman and still the best in this country .|||B-ORG O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
No-one will argue with that .|||O O O O O O
-DOCSTART-|||O
The Romanian Soccer Federation has banned first division club Jiul Petrosani 's president Miron Cozma for two years for headbutting a visiting team player , a federation statement said .|||O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Romania 's soccer bosses also fined Cozma , a well-known miners ' union leader , 10 million lei ( $ 3000 ) for the half-time attack on Dinamo Bucharest 's Danut Lupu last Sunday .|||B-LOC O O O O O B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O B-PER I-PER O O O
Miners led by Cozma rioted in Bucharest in 1990 and 1991 , bringing down the reformist government of premier Petre Roman .|||O O O B-PER O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER O
Cozma is awaiting trial for assault and criminal damage in a bar in his home town of Petrosan , 300 kms west of Bucharest .|||B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O O B-LOC O
" Cozma 's blow was not too painful because I 'm a tall man , " Lupu told Reuters on Tuesday .|||O B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER O B-ORG O O O
Jiul Petrosani , promoted to the first division this year , won the league game 1-0 .|||B-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Cozma is barred from taking part in any official soccer activity during the ban .|||B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

TENNIS - EDBERG EXTENDS GRAND SLAM RUN , TOPPLES WIMBLEDON CHAMP .|||O O B-PER O O O O O O B-LOC O O
Larry Fine|||B-PER I-PER
Stefan Edberg produced some of his vintage best on Tuesday to extend his grand run at the Grand Slams by toppling Wimbledon champion Richard Krajicek in straight sets at the U.S. Open .|||B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC I-MISC O O B-MISC O B-PER I-PER O O O O O B-MISC I-MISC O
Edberg , competing in the 54th consecutive and final Grand Slam event of his illustrious career , turned back the clock at Stadium Court with a flowing 6-3 6-3 6-3 serve-and-volley victory over the fifth-seeded Dutchman .|||B-PER O O O O O O O O B-MISC I-MISC O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC I-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O
" It 's a win that I can be proud of , " said the 30-year-old Swede , winner of two U.S. Opens and six Grand Slam titles in all . "|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O O O B-LOC O O O B-MISC I-MISC O O O O O
It 's never easy to beat the Wimbledon champion . "|||O O O O O O O B-MISC O O O
Edberg , who has said he will retire at season 's end , made it look easy under gray skies at the National Tennis Centre .|||B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC I-LOC I-LOC O
The unseeded Swede struck quickly , breaking Krajicek in the first game and never let loose his grip on the one hour 44 minute match as he served and volleyed with the grace that made him one of the dominant players of his time .|||O O B-MISC O O O O B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
" I still have my days where I feel great out there . "|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Also reaching the second round were top-seeded defending champion Pete Sampras , a 6-2 6-2 6-1 winner over last minute replacement Jimy Szymanski of Venezuela , called on after Adrian Voinea of Romania withdrew because of a sprained ankle .|||O O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER O B-LOC O O O O B-PER I-PER O B-LOC O O O O O O O
Third seed Thomas Muster of Austria also charged into the second round with a 6-1 7-6 ( 7-2 ) 6-2 romp over Javier Frana of Argentina .|||O O B-PER I-PER O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER O B-LOC O
Marcelo Rios of Chile , the 10th seed , also advanced .|||B-PER I-PER O B-LOC O O O O O O O O
Rios claimed a 4-6 6-1 6-4 6-2 victory over Romania 's Andrei Pavel .|||B-PER O O O O O O O O B-LOC O B-PER I-PER O
The fifth- seeded Majoli joined Anke Huber ( 5 ) and Magdalena Maleeva ( 12 ) on the sidelines .|||O O O B-PER O B-PER I-PER O O O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O

BASEBALL - GIANTS EDGE PHILLIES 1-0 .|||O O B-ORG O B-ORG O O
SAN FRANCISCO 1996-08-27|||B-LOC I-LOC O
VanLandingham ( 8-13 ) , who entered the game with one complete game in the first 56 starts of his career , limited the Phillies to two hits and two walks with four strikeouts .|||B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG O O O O O O O O O O
" We 've been working all year on my follow-through , and I really concentrated on that , " VanLandingham said . "|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER O O O
It gave me more life in all of my pitches , so the ball moved more . "|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
At Colorado , Andres Galarraga homered and drove in three runs as the Colorado Rockies had 10 extra-base hits and Billy Swift won his first game in almost a year in a 9-5 rain-shortened seven-inning victory over the Cincinnati Reds .|||O B-LOC O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O O O O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O

BASEBALL - ORIOLES WIN , YANKEES LOSE .|||O O B-ORG O O B-ORG O O
Cal Ripken 's bases-loaded walk scored Brady Anderson with the winning run in the bottom of the 10th as the Baltimore Orioles regained control of the top spot in the wild-card race with a wild 12-11 victory over the Oakland Athletics .|||B-PER I-PER O O O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O
Trailing by a run entering the 11th , the Orioles rallied against Oakland reliever Mark Acre ( 0-2 ) with a walk and a triple by Brady Anderson to tie the game .|||O O O O O O O O O B-ORG O O B-ORG O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O
The Yankees have lost 12 of their last 19 games and their lead in the AL East over Baltimore fell to five games .|||O B-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC B-MISC O B-ORG O O O O O
At California , Tim Wakefield pitched a six-hitter for his third complete game of the season and Mo Vaughn and Troy O'Leary hit solo home runs in the second inning as the surging Boston Red Sox won their third straight 4-1 over the California Angels .|||O B-LOC O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O
Boston has won seven of eight and is 20-6 since August 2nd .|||B-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O
The Red Sox are two games over .500 for the first time this season .|||O B-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O
In Chicago , Cal Eldred pitched 5-1/3 scoreless innings and John Jaha scored one run and doubled in another as the Milwaukee Brewers held off the slumping Chicago White Sox , 3-2 .|||O B-LOC O B-PER I-PER O O O O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O O O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG O O O
Eldred ( 6-5 ) walked one and struck out three .|||O O O O O O O O O O O

TENNIS - CHANG , WASHINGTON ADVANCE , TWO WOMEN 'S SEEDS FALL .|||O O B-PER O B-LOC O O O O O O O O
Larry Fine|||B-PER I-PER
NEW YORK 1996-08-26|||B-LOC I-LOC O
Michael Chang is playing in his 10th U.S. Open and enjoying his highest seeding ever , but the 24-year-old American had to overcome a case of the jitters Monday before winning his first-round match on opening day .|||B-PER I-PER O O O O O B-MISC I-MISC O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Chang , seeded second behind defending champion Pete Sampras , took two hours 40 minutes to defeat 186th-ranked Jaime Oncins of Brazil 3-6 6-1 6-0 7-6 , 8-6 in the tiebreaker .|||B-PER O O O O O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O
" I was pretty tight the whole match , " conceded Chang , one of the hottest players on tour this summer with a 16-2 record on hardcourts that included two titles and a runner-up finish .|||O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
" Everyone has moments when they get tight .|||O O O O O O O O O
Hopefully , this will have been my nerves for the whole tournament . "|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Joining Chang into the second round was Wimbledon runner-up MaliVai Washington , the 11th seed , who also needed four sets to get past talented Moroccan Karim Alami 6-4 2-6 7-6 ( 7-5 ) 6-1 .|||O B-PER O O O O O B-MISC O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O
The 27-year-old American hurried off the Stadium Court for treatment of an upset stomach after his two and a half hour struggle against Alami .|||O O B-MISC O O O B-LOC I-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER O
" Towards the end of my match my stomach felt like week-old sushi , " said Washington . "|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O
Maybe it was a combination of the heat and something I ate . "|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Chang and Washington were the only men 's seeds in action on a day that saw two seeded women 's players fall .|||B-PER O B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Australian Open runner-up Anke Huber of Germany , the sixth seed , was undone by an unlucky draw that put her against 17th ranked South African Amanda Coetzer in her opening match .|||B-MISC I-MISC O B-PER I-PER O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC I-MISC B-PER I-PER O O O O O
Coetzer claimed revenge for the semifinal defeat she suffered to Huber in Melbourne by taking a 6-1 2-6 6-2 victory .|||B-PER O O O O O O O O O B-PER O B-LOC O O O O O O O O
Last year 's Wimbledon junior champion , Aleksandra Olsza of Poland , removed another seed from the draw by eliminating number 12 Magdalena Maleeva of Bulgaria 6-4 6-2 .|||O O O B-MISC O O O B-PER I-PER O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER O B-LOC O O O
Other men 's winners included a pair of former Grand Slam tournament champions whose victories set up a showdown in the second round .|||O O O O O O O O O B-MISC I-MISC O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Germany 's Michael Stich , the 1991 Wimbledon champion , and two-time French Open winner Sergi Bruguera of Spain will face each other next after beating German Tommy Haas 6-3 1-6 6-1 7-5 , and Belgian Kris Goossens 6-2 6-0 7-6 ( 7-1 ) , respectively .|||B-LOC O B-PER I-PER O O O B-MISC O O O O B-MISC I-MISC O B-PER I-PER O B-LOC O O O O O O O B-MISC B-PER I-PER O O O O O O B-MISC B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O
Tarango was leading 6-7 ( 5-7 ) 6-4 6-1 3-1 .|||B-PER O O O O O O O O O O
Chang blamed breezy conditions for some of the erratic play in his match with Oncins , who had beaten him in the round of 32 at the 1992 Barcelona Olympics .|||B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC B-MISC O
Chang committed an untidy 53 unforced errors , though he made seven fewer than the Brazilian , who also walloped a woeful 24 double faults .|||B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O O O O O O O O O
The most deflating double fault came when Oncins was serving to force a fifth set , leading 6-4 in the tiebreaker .|||O O O O O O O B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
The set point came after confusion at the net on the point previous , which was awarded to Oncins after the two exchanged shots at close quarters at the net .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O
First Chang approached the umpire , then Oncins , then Chang again before play finally resumed .|||O B-PER O O O O O B-PER O O B-PER O O O O O O
" Those little seconds were like an hour to me , " said Oncins , who promptly fired two serves barely contained by the baseline as he frittered away his best chance .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Chang ran off the next three points to close out the match but for Oncins , the contest was a personal victory .|||B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER O O O O O O O O
The 26-year-old Brazilian had risen into the top 30 in 1992 .|||O O B-MISC O O O O O O O O O
The next year a close friend was struck by a stray bullet while riding home in a car from a soccer game in Sao Paulo .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC I-LOC O
He died slumped against Oncins , who subsequently lost interest in tennis .|||O O O O B-PER O O O O O O O O
" Two months ago I started talking about quitting , " said Oncins , who decided to give it one last try and made it through the Open qualifying tournament last weekend .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O O O O
" I believe in my game again , " he said .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O
At the end of the day , a spate of withdrawals from the tournament were announced .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Eighth seed Jim Courier withdrew because of a bruised right knee , and 1988 Open champion Mats Wilander bowed out due to a groin pull , organisers said .|||O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O O O
Women 's ninth seed Mary Joe Fernandez pulled out because of tendinitis in her right wrist .|||O O O O B-PER I-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O O

SOCCER - MARSEILLE HOLD AUXERRE TO GOALLESS DRAW .|||O O B-ORG O B-ORG O O O O
PARIS 1996-08-27|||B-LOC O
Former European champions Marseille held French champions Auxerre to a goalless draw in a lacklustre league match on Tuesday .|||O B-MISC O B-ORG O B-MISC O B-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O
Auxerre , who start their European Cup campaign next week against Ajax Amsterdam , dominated the match but were unable to score .|||B-ORG O O O O B-MISC I-MISC O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O O O O O
Unbeaten in four matches , they still trail leaders Lens by one point .|||O O O O O O O O O B-ORG O O O O
Lens , who have won all their three league matches so far , host Montpellier on Wednesday night .|||B-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG O O O O
After two seasons in the second division and after taking on half a dozen new recruits this season , some of whom do not speak a word of French , Marseille are not playing with any fluidity .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O B-ORG O O O O O O O
But German international goalkeeper Andreas Koepke again proved a sound investment when under pressure from the Auxerre strikers , saving his team with a number of fine parries .|||O B-MISC O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O
Marseille now lie seventh in the league on five points .|||B-ORG O O O O O O O O O O

GENEVA 1996-08-27|||B-LOC O
Swiss league leaders Neuchatel Xamax said on Tuesday they would appeal against a nine-month ban imposed on French international defender Jean-Pierre Cyprien for his part in a post-match brawl .|||B-MISC O O B-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O
Cyprien , also fined 10,000 Swiss francs ( $ 8,400 ) , traded punches with St Gallen 's Brazilian player Claudio Moura after a match on Saturday .|||B-PER O O O O B-MISC O O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O B-MISC O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O
When officials and coaching staff tried to intervene , Cyprien launched a flying kick at Moura , but only succeeded in kneeing St Gallen coach Roger Hegi in the stomach .|||O O O O O O O O O B-PER O O O O O B-PER O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O B-PER I-PER O O O O
Moura , who appeared to have elbowed Cyprien in the final minutes of the 3-0 win by Neuchatel , was suspended for seven matches and fined 1,000 francs ( $ 840 ) by the Swiss league disciplinary committee .|||B-PER O O O O O O B-PER O O O O O O O O O B-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O O O
Club president Gilbert Facchinetti said he was astonished the committee had arrived at its decision so quickly and vowed the club would appeal .|||O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
" During the scuffle , Moura threw the first punch .|||O O O O O B-PER O O O O O
Tomorrow , if someone punches me , I would not know how to react . "|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Cyprien , who won his one French cap against Italy in February 1994 , cannot play in Switzerland or elsewhere until May next year .|||B-PER O O O O O B-MISC O O B-LOC O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O

CYCLING - BUGNO CLEARED OF DOPING .|||O O B-PER O O O O
Veteran Italian Gianni Bugno has been cleared of doping after testing positive for high levels of testosterone during the Tour of Switzerland in June , the Italian cycling federation said on Tuesday .|||O B-MISC B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC I-MISC I-MISC O O O O B-MISC O O O O O O
The case is closed , " a spokesman said .|||O O O O O O O O O O
But the spokesman said subsequent tests in Cologne proved his body produced higher-than-average testosterone levels naturally .|||O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O
Bugno , who won the Giro d'Italia in 1990 and two successive world titles , was banned for three months in 1994 after testing positive for the stimulant caffeine .|||B-PER O O O O B-MISC I-MISC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

COFINEC SLIPS ON BUDAPEST BOURSE BUT FUTURE STRONG .|||B-ORG O O B-LOC O O O O O
Emese Bartha|||B-PER I-PER
Expectations that Cofinec S.A. , the Hungarian bourse 's first foreign listing , will report a disappointing first half have depressed the stock below its issue price , but analysts expect a rebound in the long term .|||O O B-ORG I-ORG O O B-MISC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
" The first half of the year is unlikely to be as strong as expected so the company will probably be unable to reach its annual plan in 1996 , " said Gabor Sitanyi , a London-based analyst for ING Barings .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O
The French-registered packaging materials company , which floated its shares in Hungary in July , for most of the past two weeks hovered below the 6,425 forints / Global Depositary Receipts price of its initial offering , which was oversubscribed .|||O B-MISC O O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
The company , which asked for a two-week delay from the usual August 15 deadline for reporting first-half results , closed on Tuesday at 5,800 forints , down 300 .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
" Cofinec 's first-half figures will be ...|||O B-ORG O O O O O O
between one-third of two-fifths of its annual plan , " said Tamas Erdei , a Budapest-based analyst for ABN-AMRO Hoare Govett .|||O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER O O B-MISC O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG O
Hungary 's Gross Domestic Product fell one percentage point in the first quarter while real wages plunged 7.2 percentage points in the first half of 1996 .|||B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
" The eastern European market offers good chances , " said Erdei . "|||O O O B-MISC O O O O O O O B-PER O O
Just like many other companies on the bourse , Cofinec has big growth opportunities . "|||O O O O O O O O O B-ORG O O O O O O
" At the same time , it 's an advantage for Cofinec that it has a foreign management which perhaps understands the market better , " Erdei added .|||O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER O O

Kadian was approved for sale in the United States last month , Faulding said .|||B-MISC O O O O O O B-LOC I-LOC O O O B-ORG O O

Peter Smerdon|||B-PER I-PER
NAIROBI 1996-08-27|||B-LOC O
The main rebel group in south Sudan said on Tuesday it was trying to arrange the release of six Roman Catholic missionaries , including three Australian nuns , held for nearly two weeks .|||O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC I-MISC O O O O B-MISC O O O O O O O O
This is a decision of the leadership , " Garang said .|||O O O O O O O O O B-PER O O
" Commander Nuour Marial is a soldier so he must accept the leadership 's decision .|||O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O
But communications at this time of year are very difficult because of rains and a lack of power , " he added .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
" These charges are the interpretation of the church , " Garang said on Tuesday . "|||O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER O O O O O
We have no idea why they are being held .|||O O O O O O O O O O
We are still trying to establish contact with the local commander . "|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Asked whether this meant the commander was out of control , Garang said the rebel movement was working on the problem .|||O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER O O O O O O O O O O
He said he believed all six were being held in the mission compound at Mapourdit and were reported to be in good health .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O
It said Australian Sister Maureen Carey , 52 , and Italian Brother Raniero Iacomella , 28 , were held inside the compound .|||O O B-MISC O B-PER I-PER O O O O B-MISC O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O
The church in Australia said on Monday Lynch , Batchelor , Barton and Riel were held in a prison until the weekend , when they were moved to join the other captives at the compound .|||O O O B-LOC O O O B-PER O B-PER O B-PER O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

Under a constitution agreed in 1992 , a year after independence , the president has no executive powers .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
His only political role is to smoothe the functioning of government in periods of crisis .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
But Meri , 67 , has been accused in parliament of taking too much power and not always consulting parliamentarians before making decisions .|||O B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
His relations with a leftist-led government have sometimes been tense .|||O O O O O O O O O O O
His support in the first round of voting on Monday was much lower than expected , scoring only 45 votes , which political analysts put down as a vote of no confidence in his performance .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
This support only inched up to 49 in the second vote .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O
Support for Ruutel , 68 , remained constant at 34 votes .|||O O B-PER O O O O O O O O O
If the third vote fails to give either Meri or Ruutel 68 votes , the parliamentary speaker will convene an electoral college of 101 MPs and 273 local goverment representatives to hold a new poll that could include new nominations .|||O O O O O O O O B-PER O B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
This would be the first time that the former Soviet republic has had to call together an electoral college .|||O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O O O O O O O O O

Nicaraguan drunks fear " lovebite " bandit .|||B-MISC O O O O O O O
MANAGUA , Nicaragua 1996-08-27|||B-LOC O B-LOC O
Heavy drinkers in a Nicaraguan city were searching for someone who has covered them in " lovebites " while they were passed out in a drunken stupor , a local newspaper reported on Tuesday .|||O O O O B-MISC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
The dreaded " chupabolos " -- " drunksucker " -- preys on men who have passed out in the streets of Matagalpa , 80 miles ( 130 kms ) north of Managua , placing hickey-like " lovebites " on various parts of their bodies , El Nuevo Diario reported .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG O O
Enraged drunks and street people in this town known for its machismo have organised a so-far unsuccessful search for the culprit who finds victims in the dark streets surrounding a local market .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
In spite of the collective fear gripping Matagalpa 's drinkers , local women expressed little sympathy .|||O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O
" Its just desserts for all the ' bolos ' ( drunkards ) who sleep in the streets of our beautiful town , " said a woman who worked in the local market .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

SAO PAULO 1996-08-27|||B-PER I-PER O
Brazil is likely to turn Sao Paulo state bank Banespa into a federal bank in a prior step to privatization , according to unnamed government sources , O Globo daily said .|||B-LOC O O O O B-LOC I-LOC O O B-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O O O
The newspaper said the Central Bank special administration of Banespa ends in December 30 and after that the bank has to be liquidated or turned into a federal bank since there are no conditions to return Banespa to Sao Paulo state government .|||O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O O O B-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG O B-LOC I-LOC O O O
A Central Bank spokesman said he could not confirm or deny the report .|||O B-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O
The central bank management could be lifted if Sao Paulo state decided to take part in the recent federal government 's plan to restructure state banks .|||O O O O O O O O B-LOC I-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Although the plan was designed under terms proposed by Sao Paulo state governor Mario Covas , he has showed no interest in taking part in the plan because Sao Paulo 's debt with Banespa has increased sharply , O Globo said .|||O O O O O O O O O B-LOC I-LOC O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC I-LOC O O O B-ORG O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O O
Sao Paulo state 's debt is now estimated at 19 billion reais .|||B-LOC I-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O
O Globo also said another delicate case to be solved involves private bank Bamerindus .|||B-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG O
Bamerindus , Brazil 's fourth-largest private bank , has been facing liquidity troubles .|||B-ORG O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O

Former Argentine benevolent dictator Alejandro Lanusse dies .|||O B-MISC O O B-PER I-PER O O
Alejandro Lanusse , the former dictator who ruled Argentina for two years , died at age 78 on Monday .|||B-PER I-PER O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O
Lanusse died after being brought to a hospital a week ago following a fall at home that resulted in a blood clot in the brain .|||B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
The former dictator , who ruled from 1971 to 1973 , was best known for allowing Juan Domingo Peron , Argentina 's famed populist leader , to return to Argentina after 17 years of forced exile .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER I-PER O B-LOC O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O
But unlike his two predecessors , Juan Carlos Ongania and Marcelo Levingston , who ruled Argentina with an iron hand , Lanusse steered the country toward democracy .|||O O O O O O B-PER I-PER O O B-PER I-PER O O O B-LOC O O O O O B-PER O O O O O O
That resulted in general elections in March 1973 when the Peronists led by Hector Campora and Vicente Solano Lima returned to power .|||O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG O O B-PER I-PER O B-PER I-PER I-PER O O O O
Lanusse 's rule saw the gradual rise of left-wing activism which culminated in another period of brutal Argentine dictatorship from 1976 to 1983 , during which the military launched its " dirty war " that resulted in 10,000 missing people .|||B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
He was born in Buenos Aires in 1918 and married Ileana Bell with whom he had nine children .|||O O O O B-LOC I-LOC O O O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O
He entered the Military College in 1935 .|||O O O B-ORG I-ORG O O O

" Observation of food supplies and their distribution are still a major issue and seems the two sides have not yet filled the gap separating them , " said another diplomat .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Iraq 's partial oil sales pact with U.N. , allowing crude exports worth $ 2 billion every six months , gives U.N. the right to supervise the purchase and distribution of food supplies in the country .|||B-LOC O O O O O O B-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

Poll shows Clinton lead over Dole jumps to 15 pts .|||O O B-PER O O B-PER O O O O O
An ABC News poll released on Tuesday showed President Bill Clinton 's lead over Republican challenger Bob Dole stretching to 15 points in advance of the Nov. 5 election .|||O B-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O B-PER I-PER O O O B-MISC O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O
The poll , taken on Sunday and Monday as the president engaged in a whistle-stop train trip to the Democratic Convention in Chicago , put Clinton at 51 percent , Dole at 36 percent and Ross Perot of the Reform Party at 8 percent .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC I-MISC O B-LOC O O B-PER O O O O B-PER O O O O B-PER I-PER O O B-ORG I-ORG O O O O
A similar poll conducted on Saturday and Sunday had showed a nine point lead for Clinton , ahead by 47-38 percent .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER O O O O O O
Dole , down by around 20 points in early August in ABC polls , had closed to within four percentage points immediately after the Republican convention in San Diego earlier in August .|||B-PER O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O B-LOC I-LOC O O O O
Tuesday 's poll involved 1,002 registered voters and had a margin of error of 3.5 percentage points .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
ABC said a parallel poll of 824 likely voters showed the president ahead by 11 points , with Clinton at 50 percent , Dole at 39 percent and Perot at 6 percent .|||B-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER O O O O B-PER O O O O B-PER O O O O
The poll gave Clinton a 53 percent to 39 percent lead over Dole if Perot were not in the race .|||O O O B-PER O O O O O O O O B-PER O B-PER O O O O O O
The poll indicated a fall in the number of people who believed Dole would be able to fulfil his promise to cut the federal budget deficit and cut income taxes by 15 percent at the same time .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
It showed 23 percent believed it possible compared to 70 who believed it was n't .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
That compared to 26-57 in the previous poll .|||O O O O O O O O O

PHILADELPHIA 1996-08-27|||B-LOC O
A two-year old Puerto Rican girl began surgical treatment on Tuesday for a rare condition that has left half of her face covered with a hairy , dark-brown patch of skin .|||O O O B-MISC I-MISC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
The girl , Abyss DeJesus , suffers from a " hairy nevus " on the right side of her face , a condition that has only been reported a few times in medical journals , the St. Christopher Children 's Hospital said .|||O O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC I-LOC I-LOC I-LOC I-LOC O O
In addition to social ostracism , the condition also carries a high risk of cancer .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
It will be corrected by gradually expanding healthy skin with a surgical balloon , then transplanting that skin to the afflicted side of her face .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
" She is doing well , " hospital spokeswoman Carol Norris said . "|||O O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER O O O
The surgery is under way . "|||O O O O O O O

Mother Teresa turns 86 but still in danger .|||B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O
Rupam Banerjee|||B-PER I-PER
CALCUTTA 1996-08-27|||B-LOC O
Doctors said that later in the day they would try to wean the Nobel Peace Prize laureate from the respirator that has aided her breathing for the past six days .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC I-MISC I-MISC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
" Her condition seems to be better , but the danger remains as long as she is on respirator , " an official at Woodlands Nursing Home said . "|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC I-LOC I-LOC O O O
She is conscious but her breathing is irregular . "|||O O O O O O O O O O
The revered Roman Catholic nun was admitted to the Calcutta hospital a week ago with high fever and severe vomiting .|||O O B-MISC I-MISC O O O O O B-LOC I-LOC O O O O O O O O O O
She later suffered heart failure and was diagnosed with malaria .|||O O O O O O O O O O O
Her fever has since abated and the heart failure has been brought under control , but her heart continues to beat irregularly , doctors said .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
" Unless she breathes on her own , I would advise you to keep your fingers crossed , " said a doctor who was familiar with her case but not part of the six-member team treating Mother Teresa .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER O
The nun 's birthday prompted greetings , bouquets and prayers from around the world .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Pope John Paul II and Israeli Foreign Minister David Levy sent her get-well messages , the Press Trust of India said .|||B-PER I-PER I-PER O O B-MISC O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG O O
" Ask for a miracle .|||O O O O O O
Happy Birthday to our Dearest Mother , " read a placard at the Shishu Bhavan children 's home in central Calcutta run by Mother Teresa 's Missionaries of Charity .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O O O O O B-LOC O O B-PER I-PER O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG O
On Monday , both houses of India 's parliament wished the nation 's adopted sister a happy birthday and speedy recovery from her illness .|||O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Prayers continued in Calcutta , one of the world 's poorest cities , where Mother Teresa 's Missionaries of Charity runs several homes for the poor and destitute .|||O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O O O O
Street children , some of them born to prostitutes , held prayers on the street . "|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
All of us know about her .|||O O O O O O O
She is like a goddess , " said Raju , 8 , who has a mother but no father .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
The Statesman newspaper quoted 40-year-old Mangala Das , paralysed from her waist down and a resident of the Prem Dan ( Gift of Love ) home for the destitute , as saying she and her friends had been praying incessantly for Mother Teresa 's recovery .|||B-ORG I-ORG O O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER O O O

A spokesman for Masood said he had told the California Republican at a meeting in northern Kabul that President Burhanuddin Rabbani 's government favoured talks with all Afghan factions to set up an interim government .|||O O O B-PER O O O O O B-LOC B-MISC O O O O O B-LOC O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O B-MISC O O O O O O O O
The factions should agree to appoint a transitional leader , draft a new constitution , collect heavy weapons , create a national army and hold free elections in which the transitional leader would be barred from standing , he added .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

" America wants to block the establishment of a strong Islamic government in Afghanistan and the U.S. intends to neutralise the Afghan peace process initiated by the Afghans themselves , " said the spokesman , Hamid Ibrahimi .|||O B-LOC O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O B-LOC O O B-LOC O O O O B-MISC O O O O O B-MISC O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER O
" A great game has been started in Afghanistan as America feels that Tehran and Moscow have got stronger in the Afghan picture -- something Washington wants to change , " he said .|||O O O O O O O O B-LOC O B-LOC O O B-LOC O B-LOC O O O O O B-MISC O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O
Rohrabacher was expected to visit neutral faction leaders in the eastern city of Jalalabad and meet leaders of the rebel Islamic Taleban militia in the southern city of Kandahar .|||B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O B-MISC I-MISC O O O O O O B-LOC O

Bangladesh Speaker says he received death threats .|||B-LOC O O O O O O O
DHAKA 1996-08-27|||B-LOC O
He told the Bengali newspaper Banglabazar Patrika on Tuesday that such threats were possibly coming from " those who want to push the country into chaos and unrest . "|||O O O B-MISC O B-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Choudhury , a former foreign minister and veteran diplomat , was appointed speaker of the 330-member parliament on July 13 , a month after general elections returned the Awami League of Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina to power after 21 years .|||B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O O O O B-PER O O O O O O
Choudhury also was president of the 41st session of the U.N. General Assembly in 1986-87 .|||B-PER O O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG O O O
Former prime minister Begum Khaleda Zia , now the opposition leader in parliament and head of the Bangladesh Nationalist Party ( BNP ) , said her followers might boycott assemby sessions chaired by the " partisan " speaker .|||O O O B-PER I-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG O B-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
" The ruling Awami league is making parliament ineffective and the speaker is contributing to that by not allowing the opposition MPs enough time to speak , " she told a rally in northern district of Bogra on Monday .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O

and we will deal with such designs sternly , " the prime minister said .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

TORONTO 1996-08-27|||B-LOC O
" We are pleased that Arequipa shareholders ahave chosen so overwhelmingly to accept this offer .|||O O O O O B-ORG O O O O O O O O O O
We now have the opportunity to realize the potential of Arequipa 's excellent assets , " Barrick chairman and chief executive Peter Munk said in a statement .|||O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG O O O O O B-ORG O O O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O
The C$ 30-a-share deal means Barrick will own Arequipa 's attractive Pierina gold deposit in Peru .|||O B-MISC O O O B-ORG O O B-ORG O O B-LOC O O O B-LOC O
Barrick 's offer of C$ 30 a share or part cash , part share offer was Barrick 's second attempt to swallow the small Vancouver-based gold prospector .|||B-ORG O O O B-MISC O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG O O O O O O O B-MISC O O O
Experts have speculated the deposit has potential reserves of up to 12 million ounces .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
More drilling results are expected soon .|||O O O O O O O
The Barrick bid took observers by surprise , since Arequipa 's exploration was still in its early stages .|||O B-ORG O O O O O O O B-ORG O O O O O O O O O
Arequipa shareholders had the option to choose C$ 30 cash or 0.79 Barrick shares plus 50 cents for each Arequipa share .|||B-ORG O O O O O O B-MISC O O O O B-ORG O O O O O O B-ORG O O

AOL Europe forms online advertising agency .|||B-ORG I-ORG O O O O O
HANOVER , Germany 1996-08-27|||B-LOC O B-LOC O
The joint venture between America Online ( AOL ) and Bertelsmann AG has formed a new company to sell advertising space on AOL in Europe , a Bertelsmann official said on Tuesday .|||O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O B-ORG O O B-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG O B-LOC O O B-ORG O O O O O
The new company is called AdOn GmbH and is located in Hamburg , Bernd Schiphorst , president and chief operating officer of Bertelsmann 's New Media business division said on the sidelines of an AOL news conference at the CeBIT Home consumer electronics fair in Hanover .|||O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O O O O B-LOC O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O B-ORG O B-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O O O B-ORG O O O O B-MISC O O O O O O O
Jan Buettner , managing director of AOL Germany , said AdOn was in the formation phase and would " get off the ground next year , bringing in advertising from around Europe . "|||B-PER I-PER O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O O B-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O
He would give no forecasts on advertising revenue .|||O O O O O O O O O
AOL is the leading global commercial online service with some six million subscribers worldwide .|||B-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
It has around 200,000 subscribers in Europe , with two thirds of that number in Germany alone .|||O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O
In Europe , the service is available in Germany , France and Britain .|||O B-LOC O O O O O O B-LOC O B-LOC O B-LOC O
It will be available in Austria and Switzerland later this year and in Scandanavia and the Benelux countries next year .|||O O O O O B-LOC O B-LOC O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O
-- William Boston , CeBIT newsroom , 0172 6736510|||O B-PER I-PER O B-MISC O O O O

ANKARA 1996-08-27|||B-LOC O
Kurdish guerrillas killed two people and took three hostage after stopping two intercity buses at a roadblock in eastern Turkey , security officials said on Tuesday .|||B-MISC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O
They told reporters a group of Kurdistan Workers Party ( PKK ) guerrillas stopped the buses at a roadblock on the road linking the eastern provinces of Erzincan and Sivas on Monday night and forced the passengers to get out .|||O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG O B-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O
The rebels killed one of the drivers and a passenger after checking the identities of the passengers , they said .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
The officials said the rebels set ablaze two buses and released all but three passengers .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
More than 20,000 people have been killed in the 12-year-old conflict between Turkish troops and PKK guerrillas fighting for autonomy or independence from Turkey .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O B-ORG O O O O O O O B-LOC O

" Because our leaders have started to behave with extreme hostility towards the interests of their peoples to court the goodwill of the Americans and the Zionists , " he added .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O B-MISC O O O O O

Wife of gun victim Brady praises Clinton .|||O O O O B-PER O B-PER O
CHICAGO 1996-08-26|||B-LOC O
Sarah Brady , whose Republican husband was severely disabled in an assassination attempt on President Ronald Reagan , took centre stage at the Democratic National convention on Monday night to praise President Bill Clinton 's gun control efforts .|||B-PER I-PER O O B-MISC O O O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O B-MISC I-MISC I-MISC O O O O O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O
With her husband James sitting in a wheelchair to the side of the podium , Mrs. Brady called the handgun control bill that a Democratic Congress passed and Clinton signed in 1994 a major step in controlling firearm violence in the United States .|||O O O B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER O O O O O O O B-MISC B-ORG O O B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC I-LOC O
But she said more had to be done .|||O O O O O O O O O
The Bradys walked on to the stage , he on her arm and with the aid of a cane , to a rousing reception from the convention .|||O B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
" Jim , we must have made a wrong turn .|||O B-PER O O O O O O O O O
This is n't San Diego ( site of the Republican convention ) , " Mrs. Brady joked to her husband , who was serving as Reagan 's press secretary when he was shot .|||O O O B-LOC I-LOC O O O O B-MISC O O O O O B-PER O O O O O O O O O B-PER O O O O O O O O
Today , and every day , the Brady Law is stopping an estimated 85 felons from buying a handgun , " Mrs. Brady said .|||O O O O O O O B-MISC I-MISC O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER O O
She added , " But we need to do more .|||O O O O O O O O O O O
Jim and I join with you tonight in saluting the great job that President Clinton has done in fighting crime and gun violence . "|||B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER O O O O O O O O O O
" He 's a hunter and a sportsman , but he understands the difference between a Remington rifle and an AK47 .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O O B-MISC O
And he knows that you do n't go hunting with an Uzi .|||O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O
Mr. President you deserve our thanks . "|||O O O O O O O O
Jim Brady then gave a big thumbs to the audience .|||B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O
Brady|||B-PER
was shot in the head in 1981 by gunman John Hinckley , who tried to kill Reagan in a deranged bid to impress Jodie Foster , an actress he never met but with whom he was obsessed .|||O O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O B-PER O O O O O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O
The Brady bill , calling for a waiting period before someone could buy a gun so a background check could be made , was first introduced in Congress in 1987 but it took seven years to pass because of opposition from the National Rifle Association gun lobby .|||O B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG O O O

Hijacked Sudan plane lands at a London airport .|||O B-LOC O O O O B-LOC O O
STANSTED , England 1996-08-27|||B-LOC O B-LOC O
A hijacked Sudan Airways plane carrying 199 passengers and crew landed at Stansted airport just outside London early on Tuesday morning after flying from Cyprus , eyewitnesses said .|||O O B-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O
Security was tight at Stansted airport , which is about 30 miles ( 50 km ) northeast of the capital .|||O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Stansted has been designated as the preferred option for handling hijackings in southern England because it is more remote than Heathrow and Gatwick , London 's two major airports , and handles less air traffic .|||B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O B-LOC O B-LOC O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O
Hijacked Sudan plane expected at London 's Stansted .|||O B-LOC O O O B-LOC O B-LOC O
That is where the plane is being directed to , " Ruth Collin of Essex police , the force responsible for Stansted , said .|||O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER O B-LOC O O O O O O B-LOC O O O
British officials said they would much prefer to deal with a hijacking at Stansted because of its relatively remote location and because air traffic would be less badly disrupted there than at Heathrow or Gatwick .|||B-MISC O O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC O B-LOC O
The armed hijackers of the Airbus 310 Flight 150 , which is expected to arrive about 4 a.m. ( 0300 GMT ) , have said they intend to surrender and seek political asylum in Britain .|||O O O O O B-MISC I-MISC B-MISC I-MISC O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC O
The plane was hijacked on its way from Khartoum to the Jordanian capital Amman on Monday evening and landed at Larnaca airport in Cyprus to refuel .|||O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O B-MISC O B-LOC O O O O O O B-LOC O O B-LOC O O O
The identity and number of the hijackers was not known .|||O O O O O O O O O O O

-DOCSTART-|||O
A conman who painted common Australian parrots with dye to make them look like rare birds worth thousands of dollars was jailed for fraud on Tuesday .|||O O O O O B-MISC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Denham Peiris painted six green parrots , worth about A$ 100 ( US$ 79 ) a pair , with a cinnamon hair dye and traded them as Indian Ringneck Parrots , valued at A$ 14,000 a pair .|||B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O B-MISC O O B-MISC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC I-MISC I-MISC O O O B-MISC O O O O
Peiris , 32 , of Perth , was sentenced in the Western Australian District Court to two years in jail for fraud after trading three pairs of impostor birds for 21 parrots worth a total of A$ 28,000 .|||B-PER O O O O B-LOC O O O O O B-MISC I-MISC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O
" I 'd already had three local breeders have a look at them and sent photos and videos of the birds to the eastern states for authentication -- they said they 're nice birds , " Drew told reporters outside court .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER O O O O O
It was a perfect paint job except for one feather under a wing of one bird that was only half dyed , " Drew said .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER O O
Drew said Peiris , a bird enthusiast , would have succeeded with the fraud if he had not tried to trade a fourth pair of bogus birds after an associate had told police of the scam .|||B-PER O B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

New Delhi 's stance , which was seen as effectively thwarting 2-1/2 years of negotiations at the Conference on Disarmament , drew widespread but generally muted foreign criticism .|||B-LOC I-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC I-MISC I-MISC O O O O O O O O O

-DOCSTART-|||O
WASHINGTON 1996-08-28|||B-LOC O
The new rules will require specialists at stock exchanges and market makers on Nasdaq to allow customers to view price quotes from other electronic trading systems that may not be readily available to them .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
The rules will also require that customer limit orders be displayed with prices better than those available in quotes publicly available at the time .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Specialists and market makers are companies or individuals recognised as qualified to maintain an orderly market in a stock .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
" These rules are intended to empower all investors , by allowing their orders to compete on a level playing field , and by providing the disclosure they need to make informed decisions , " said SEC Chairman Arthur Levitt .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG O B-PER I-PER O
The SEC 's goal , he added , was to create " one system where one price could be available to everybody . "|||O B-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
The director of the SEC 's division of market regulation , Richard Lindsey , said Wall Street firms will probably need to spend about $ 7 million to carry out the improvements called for by the new rules .|||O O O O B-ORG O O O O O O B-PER I-PER O O B-LOC I-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
It noted that customers whose orders were not displayed lost the chance of getting the best possible price available in the market .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
It also cited the potential problem of a two-tiered market in which market makers quote one price to public investors while quoting better prices in private systems , thus robbing investors without access to " hidden " quotes the benefit of the best available prices .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Earlier this month , the SEC settled charges of alleged malpractices on Nasdaq when the parent of the Nasdaq market , the National Association of Securities Dealers , agreed to spend $ 100 million over five years to upgrade its oversight of brokers ' trading practices .|||O O O O O B-ORG O O O O O O B-MISC O O O O O B-MISC O O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
The SEC dropped a third proposal that would have allowed investors with market orders to trade at a better price if there were shifts in prices before their orders were executed .|||O B-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
The agency said it would monitor effects of the two new rules before considering the " price improvement " proposal again .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
The agency also proposed rule changes that would require continuous " bid " and " ask " quotations from exchange specialists and market makers who trade more than 1 percent of a stock during any quarter on Nasdaq .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O
The SEC 's limit order display rule will mean a major change for Nasdaq , where such orders have never been displayed .|||O B-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O O O O O O O O
The president of the Nasdaq , Alfred Berkeley , was to hold a news conference Wednesday afternoon to elaborate on the new rules ' effects on the market , the second largest in the world .|||O O O O B-MISC O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
-DOCSTART-|||O

CYCLING - KELLY WINS WORLD TIME TRIAL TITLE .|||O O B-PER O O O O O O
MANCHESTER , England 1996-08-28|||B-LOC O B-LOC O
Shane Kelly of Australia retained the world one-kilometre time trial title at the world track championships on Wednesday , with a track record time of one minute 2.777 seconds .|||B-PER I-PER O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Kelly averaged 57.345 kph to beat Soren Lausgberg of Germany by eighteen hundredths of a second .|||B-PER O O O O O B-PER I-PER O B-LOC O O O O O O O
The bronze medal went to another German , Jan Van Eijden , in 1:04.541 .|||O O O O O O B-MISC O B-PER I-PER I-PER O O O O

Martin Ayres|||B-PER I-PER
MANCHESTER , England 1996-08-28|||B-LOC O B-LOC O
Britain 's Chris Boardman fulfilled his prediction that he would break the world 4,000 metres world record in the world track cycling championships on Wednesday .|||B-LOC O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Collinelli qualified in second place , also beating his old record in 4:17.696 .|||B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O
I do n't know if I can go any faster .|||O O O O O O O O O O O
Who knows what will happen in the later stages ? "|||O O O O O O O O O O O
Boardman , 28 , did not contest the Olympic pursuit because of its proximity to the Tour de France in which he led the French GAN team .|||B-PER O O O O O O O B-MISC O O O O O O O B-MISC I-MISC I-MISC O O O O O B-MISC B-ORG O O
However , he took a bronze medal in the Olympic road time-trial and then returned home to prepare for the world track series in the Manchester indoor velodrome .|||O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O
He adopted the " superman " riding position with arms at full stretch perfected by fellow Briton Graeme Obree , the 1995 world champion , and taken up in Atlanta by Collinelli .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC O B-PER O
Obree was forced to pull out of his title defence because of a viral infection .|||B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

CYCLING - BOARDMAN BREAKS WORLD 4,000 METRES RECORD .|||O O B-PER O O O O O O
MANCHESTER , England 1996-08-28|||B-LOC O B-LOC O
Britain 's Chris Boardman broke the world 4,000 metres cycling record by more than six seconds at the world championships on Wednesday .|||B-LOC O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Boardman clocked four minutes 13.353 seconds in the qualifying round of the individual pursuit event to beat the previous mark of 4:19.699 set by Andrea Collinelli of Italy at the Atlanta Olympics on July 24 .|||B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER O B-LOC O O B-LOC B-MISC O O O O
