SOCCER - FOWLER AND MCMANAMAN OUT OF ENGLAND SQUAD .|||O O B-PER O B-PER O O B-LOC O O
LONDON 1996-08-28|||B-LOC O
England soccer manager Glen Hoddle confirmed on Wednesday that the Liverpool pair of Steve McManaman and Robbie Fowler would miss England 's World Cup qualifying match against Moldova on Sunday .|||B-LOC O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O B-ORG O O B-PER I-PER O B-PER I-PER O O B-LOC O B-MISC I-MISC O O O B-LOC O O O
The two men , both suffering from back injuries , joined the England squad at training but it was soon clear they had no chance of making the flight to Kishinev on Friday .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O
To go another five weeks without that chance would have been foolish , " he added .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Hoddle , who has already lost the services of midfielder Darren Anderton and defender Steve Howey , delayed naming any replacements .|||B-PER O O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O
There was also concern over injuries to Paul Gascoigne , Les Ferdinand and David Batty .|||O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER O B-PER I-PER O B-PER I-PER O

HORSE RACING - JOCKEY WEAVER RECEIVES 21-DAY BAN .|||O O O O B-PER O O B-PER O
LONDON 1996-08-28|||B-LOC O
Leading rider Jason Weaver received a 21-day ban from the disciplinary committee of the Jockey Club on Wednesday .|||O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O O O
Weaver had been reported after being found guilty of irresponsible riding at the provincial track of Pontefract 10 days ago .|||B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O
It was his fourth riding offence this season .|||O O O O O O O O O
Weaver shot to prominence in 1994 when he won the English 2,000 Guineas on Mister Baileys in his first ride in a classic .|||B-PER O O O O O O O O O B-MISC B-MISC I-MISC O B-LOC I-LOC O O O O O O O O
-DOCSTART-|||O
Britain 's Steven Redgrave said on Wednesday he might change his mind and go for a fifth consecutive Olympic gold medal at the 2000 Games in Sydney .|||B-LOC O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O B-LOC O
Redgrave is one of only five athletes who have won gold medals at four successive Olympics .|||B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O
He shared victory with Matthew Pinsent in the coxless pairs at the Atlanta Games and said at the time that would be his last shot .|||O O O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O B-MISC I-MISC O O O O O O O O O O O O
I 'm only 34 .|||O O O O O
Some say that 's too old for an athlete , " he said .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
" But I 'll be 38 by Sydney and that 's not too old .|||O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O
It 's whether I have got the enthusiasm for the training over the next four years .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Rowing is an endurance sport . "|||O O O O O O O
-DOCSTART-|||O
LONDON 1996-08-28|||B-LOC O

Earlier Botham arrived in Portsmouth from Southampton only to be told his services would not be required .|||O B-PER O O B-LOC O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O
He then drove 40 kms back to play for the second XI to learn that John Stephenson had dropped out of the Middlesex match in the meantime with a shoulder injury .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O B-ORG O O O O O O O O O
Botham dashed back to Portsmouth and took the field as the thrid over began .|||B-PER O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O
Ian Botham began his test career in 1977 by dismissing Australian captain Greg Chappell with a long hop and went on to become his country 's most successful all-rounder ever with 5,200 runs , 383 wickets plus 120 catches in 102 tests .|||B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O B-MISC O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

BASEBALL - DODGERS WIN FIFTH STRAIGHT .|||O O B-ORG O O O O
Hideo Nomo allowed a run in seven innings for his fifth win in seven road starts and Greg Gagne capped a three-run fourth with a two-run homer as the Los Angeles Dodgers claimed a 5-1 victory the Montreal Expos on Tuesday .|||B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O O O
With their fifth straight win , the Dodgers moved a half-game ahead of the Expos at the top of the wild card hunt behind Nomo ( 13-10 ) , who allowed six hits and walked four with six strikeouts .|||O O O O O O O B-ORG O O O O O O B-ORG O O O O O O O O O B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
In San Francisco , Mike Williams allowed two runs in 7-1/3 innings and Benito Santiago and Ruben Amaro had RBI hits in the first inning as the Philadelphia Phillies edged the San Francisco Giants 3-2 .|||O B-LOC I-LOC O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER O B-PER I-PER O B-MISC O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG O O
It was also Williams ' first win in three career decisions against San Francisco .|||O O O B-PER O O O O O O O O B-LOC I-LOC O
The Braves led 2-1 entering the fifth , but the Pirates pushed across two runs against Smoltz ( 20-7 ) .|||O B-ORG O O O O O O O O B-ORG O O O O O B-PER O O O O
Neagle ( 14-6 ) beat the Braves for the third time this season , allowing two runs and six hits in eight innings .|||B-PER O O O O O B-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
In New York , Steve Finley 's three-run homer capped a four-run eighth inning and gave the San Diego Padres a 4-3 victory over New York , spoiling Bobby Valentine 's debut as Mets ' manager .|||O B-LOC I-LOC O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG O O O O B-LOC I-LOC O O B-PER I-PER O O O B-ORG O O O
The rally made a winner out of reliever Willie Blair|||O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER
Tony Gwynn and Wally Joyner had two hits apiece , helping the Padres to their third straight win .|||B-PER I-PER O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O B-ORG O O O O O O
In Houston , Tony Eusebio 's eighth-inning sacrifice fly capped a comeback from a five-run deficit that gave the Houston Astros a 6-5 victory over the Chicago Cubs .|||O B-LOC O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O
Sheffield , who was benched Monday , delivered a double down the left-field line in the first , scoring Luis Castilla and Alex Arias to put the Marlins ahead to stay .|||B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER O B-PER I-PER O O O B-ORG O O O O
At Colorado , Hal Morris and Eric Davis each homered and John Smiley scattered six hits over 6 2/3 innings as the Cincinnati Reds defeated the Colorado Rockies 4-3 , snapping a four-game losing streak .|||O B-LOC O B-PER I-PER O B-PER I-PER O O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O O B-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O O O

The New Zealand rugby selectors recalled fly-half Andrew Mehrtens on Wednesday when they announced their team for the third and final test in Johannesburg on Saturday .|||O B-LOC I-LOC O O O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O
He returns in place of Simon Culhane who broke a wrist in the All Blacks ' series-clinching victory in Pretoria on Saturday .|||O O O O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O O O O B-LOC O O O
Lock Ian Jones and wing Jeff Wilson have also been named in the team despite doubts over their fitness .|||O B-PER I-PER O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Jones has a knee injury while Wilson is suffering from a viral infection .|||B-PER O O O O O B-PER O O O O O O O
Blair Larsen or the uncapped Glenn Taylor are on standby to replace Jones and , with Jonah Lomu out of action with a shoulder injury picked up in Tuesday 's drawn match against Griqualand West , Eric Rush is favourite to play should Wilson fail to recover .|||B-PER I-PER O O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O B-PER O O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O B-PER I-PER O O O O O B-PER O O O O

His 170 against the MCC was an innings of supreme class against the best bowling attack we faced all tour , " Woolmer told a news conference .|||O O O O B-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER O O O O O
.|||O
" We were not able to consider Jacques Kallis , Paul Adams and Shaun Pollock due to injury and the replacements have all come from the A tour and it 's great that they are all in form . "|||O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER O B-PER I-PER O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Spin-bowling all-rounders Nicky Boje and Derek Crookes replace Pollock and Adams , while Gibbs comes in for his Western Province colleague Kallis .|||O O B-PER I-PER O B-PER I-PER O B-PER O B-PER O O B-PER O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O B-PER O

TENNIS - SERIOUS MEDVEDEV IS HAVING FUN AGAIN .|||O O O B-PER O O O O O
Richard Finn|||B-PER I-PER
NEW YORK 1996-08-28|||B-LOC I-LOC O
Outspoken Andrei Medvedev exchanged his reputation as the clown prince of tennis on Wednesday for a new no-nonsense attitude that has made life on the courts fun again .|||O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
" I think I 'm much more focused on what I have to do , and that 's playing tennis , " Medvedev said after routing Frenchman Jean-Philippe Fleurian 6-2 6-0 6-1 in the opening round of the U.S. Open .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER O O O B-MISC B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O B-MISC I-MISC O
" I realised this year , that without putting 99.9 percent of your mind into tennis , I do n't think you can successful , " said the 22-year-old Medvedev .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER O
" The whole day I 'm thinking abnout tennis .|||O O O O O O O O O O
I felt that all the other things I was doing the years before , they were distracting me , they were not helping me at all . "|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
For Medvedev that meant confining his post-match comments to tennis and not going off on tirades about about peripheral issues such as the poor quality of food in the players lounge , an entertaining rant that took his mind off the task at hand .|||O B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
" I know what I 'm here for , " said Medvedev , who lost in the second round of the Open the last two years after reaching the quarters in 1993 , the same year he tried his hand as a restaurant critic .|||O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
" I 'm not here to fight the press or talk about the food or entertain the people off the court .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
I have much less fun off the court .|||O O O O O O O O O
I have much more fun on the court , " he said .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O
The Ukrainian finally hit a low of 44th two months ago .|||O B-MISC O O O O O O O O O O
" It 's somewhere where I would n't like to stay very long , " Medvedev said of his current ranking of 36 . "|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER O O O O O O O O O
It 's a part of the penalty that I have to accept . "|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
As part of his new businesslike approach , Medvedev hired Australian coach Bob Brett at the start of this year and the partnership is beginning to pay off .|||O O O O O O O O B-PER O B-MISC O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
While Medvedev 's 77-minute romp past Fleurian was rather ordinary , the fact that the two were playing each other was rather remarkable .|||O B-PER O O O O B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
In the original draw , Medvedev and Fleurian were slotted to play each other .|||O O O O O B-PER O B-PER O O O O O O O
When controversy forced the draw to be done over -- against odds of 151-to-1 -- Medvedev and Fleurian drew each other a second time .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER O B-PER O O O O O O O
" When I saw the new draw I did n't have to change my preparation , " Medvedev said . "|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER O O O
I think it 's destined that it turned out for me . "|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O
-DOCSTART-|||O

Bill Berkrot|||B-PER I-PER
But the script that called for the usual first-round demolition by the top-ranked top seed was rewritten by 29th-ranked Indonesian Yayuk Basuki playing with nothing to lose abandon .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O
Graf , of course , prevailed 6-3 7-6 , but not before some tense moments that even had the German superstar thinking the match was going three sets .|||B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O O O O O O O O
" I won the second set , which I did n't think I would do , being down 5-2 and the chances she had at 6-5 , " Graf recalled .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER O O
Several of the other women 's seeds eased into the second round with more typical Graf-like efficiency Tuesday .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O O
But the day was not without its seeded casualties on the women 's side .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Fifth-seed Iva Majoli of Croatia was picked off by Austrian Judith Wiesner and Wimbledon semifinalist Kimiko Date of Japan , the 10th seed , fell 6-2 7-5 to 53rd-ranked American Kimberly Po .|||O B-PER I-PER O B-LOC O O O O B-MISC B-PER I-PER O B-MISC O B-PER I-PER O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC B-PER I-PER O
But Graf , winner of 20 Grand Slam titles , was not about to join that list .|||O B-PER O O O O B-MISC I-MISC O O O O O O O O O O
" At some points I felt a little nervous , " she admitted . "|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
When it came down to the important points , I felt more confident . "|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Basuki , a first-round loser here for the fifth consecutive year , was clearly going for winners , hitting the lines and running Graf around the court as she broke the top seed twice in the second set to grab that shocking 5-2 lead .|||B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
But Basuki , her long black ponytail flying as she raced for shots , held her serve and twice had set point on Graf 's serve at 6-5 before the German unleashed a forehand pass to force the tie-break .|||O B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER O O O O O O B-MISC O O O O O O O O O
" I lost the moment , " lamented Basuki , who has reached the fourth round at Wimbledon four times and was a semifinalist in Montreal earlier this month .|||O O O O O O O O B-PER O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O
" Usually in the first one or two matches , you want to find your rhythm and want to get into it , " said Graf , who won seven of the last eight points in the breaker .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O
" To be in that situation today , a couple of times having to play well , get down and play point-by-point , definitely is a good start . "|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

AMSTERDAM 1996-08-28|||B-LOC O
Brazilian striker Marcelo scored a hat-trick as PSV Eindhoven maintained their 100 percent record and stayed on top of the Dutch first division with a 3-1 win at Volendam on Wednesday .|||B-MISC O B-PER O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O
PSV 's main rivals for the title , defending champions Ajax Amsterdam , celebrated the novelty of having the roof of their new 51,000 seat stadium closed against the rain , with a 1-0 win over AZ Alkmaar .|||B-ORG O O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O
Ajax were missing six first-team players but Frank de Boer shot home the winner from a 20-metre free kick in the 30th minute of a dull game .|||B-ORG O O O O O O B-PER I-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
The Brazilian found the mark again two minutes after halftime and again in the 56th minute before midfielder Pascal Jongsma scored a consolation goal for Volendam five minutes from time .|||O B-MISC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O B-ORG O O O O O
Feyenoord Rotterdam suffered an early shock when they went 1-0 down after four minutes against de Graafschap Doetinchem .|||B-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O
The equaliser came in the 73rd minute when Swedish international Henke Larsson scored from close range and 10 minutes later Jean-Paul van Gastel gave Feyenoord a 2-1 victory from the penalty spot .|||O O O O O O O O B-MISC O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER I-PER O B-ORG O O O O O O O O
After three matches PSV lead the first division with nine points , three points clear of fifth-placed Ajax .|||O O O B-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG O

SOCCER - PARMA , ROMA AND UDINESE OUT OF ITALIAN CUP .|||O O B-ORG O B-ORG O B-ORG O O B-MISC I-MISC O
UEFA Cup hopefuls Parma and Roma , under new coaches this season , crashed out of the Italian Cup to second division opponents on Wednesday while league champions Milan could only draw 1-1 at humble Empoli .|||B-MISC I-MISC O B-ORG O B-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC I-MISC O O O O O O O O O B-ORG O O O O O O B-ORG O
Wealthy Parma , now coached by the former Italian international Carlo Ancelotti , were without new striker Enrico Chiesa and went down 3-1 at serie B club Pescara in their second round clash .|||O B-ORG O O O O O O B-MISC O B-PER I-PER O O O O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O B-ORG O O O O O O
The second round was the entry point for the bulk of the serie A sides with the winners going through .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC I-MISC O O O O O O O
The later stages of the cup are played over two legs .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O
Roma , now coached by Argentine Carlos Bianchi and watched by Italian national coach Arrigo Sacchi , lost 3-1 to Cesena -- another repeat of last season when the Rome club also went out at the first hurdle .|||B-ORG O O O O B-MISC B-PER I-PER O O O B-MISC O O B-PER I-PER O O O O B-ORG O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O
Udinese , with Germany 's Euro ' 96 hero Oliver Bierhoff in their lineup , completed the hat-trick of beaten serie A sides when they went under 2-1 to newly relegated Cremonese .|||B-ORG O O B-LOC O B-MISC I-MISC I-MISC O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O B-MISC I-MISC O O O O O O O O O B-ORG O
Milan 's new Uruguayan coach Oscar Tabarez avoided the nightmare of defeat but faces a replay at home next Sunday .|||B-ORG O O B-MISC O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Cup holders Fiorentina easily beat Cosenza 3-1 while European Cup holders Juventus also cruised through with a 2-0 win at small southern club Fidelis Andria .|||B-MISC O B-ORG O O B-ORG O O B-MISC I-MISC O B-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O
Two cup matches could not be played on Wednesday due to argument over first round results .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Lecce 's 3-0 weekend defeat of Genoa was expected to be overturned by a sporting judge on Thursday after the home club fielded an ineligible player .|||B-ORG O O O O O B-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
That would set Genoa up for a second round match against local rivals Sampdoria .|||O O O B-ORG O O O O O O O O O B-ORG O
Nocerina 's 4-3 defeat of Piacenza was also subject to a complaint , later removed , that forced their second round match against serie A newcomers Perugia to be delayed .|||B-ORG O O O O B-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC I-MISC O B-ORG O O O O

SOCCER - BAYERN HIT FOUR TO TAKE BUNDESLIGA TOP SPOT .|||O O B-ORG O O O O B-MISC O O O
Goals from Thomas Helmer and Juergen Klinsmann helped Bayern Munich to a 4-2 home win over Bayer Leverkusen on Wednesday and powered them to the top of the Bundesliga .|||O O B-PER I-PER O B-PER I-PER O B-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O
The comfortable victory gave Bayern 10 points from their first four games , a point ahead of second-placed Stuttgart , who have a game in hand .|||O O O O B-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG O O O O O O O O
Brazilian midfielder Paulo Sergio put Leverkusen ahead in the 25th minute but Alexander Zickler equalised just a minute later .|||B-MISC O B-PER I-PER O B-ORG O O O O O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O
A header from Helmer and an acrobatic strike from Klinsmann gave Bayern a two-goal cushion at halftime .|||O O O B-PER O O O O O B-PER O B-ORG O O O O O O
But the pick of the 13-times champions ' goals came from Ruggiero Rizzitelli , who beat three defenders to put Bayern 4-1 up .|||O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O B-ORG O O O
Markus Feldhoff hit a consolation goal for Leverkusen .|||B-PER I-PER O O O O O B-ORG O

SOCCER - SMICER 'S LAST-GASP GOAL KEEPS LENS IN THE LEAD .|||O O B-PER O O O O B-ORG O O O O
PARIS 1996-08-28|||B-LOC O
Euro 96 star Vladimir Smicer of the Czech Republic scored at the last second for Lens , allowing them to retain the lead in the French soccer league on Wednesday .|||B-MISC I-MISC O B-PER I-PER O O B-LOC I-LOC O O O O O O B-ORG O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O O O O
Smicer pushed the ball home in injury time to lead his team to a 3-2 victory over Montpellier , who were leading 2-1 until Cameroon 's Marc-Vivien Foe equalised on a header in the 85th minute .|||B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG O O O O O O B-LOC O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O
In-form Paris St Germain , who dismissed Nantes 1-0 , are second with 10 points .|||O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG O O O B-ORG O O O O O O O O
Along with Smicer , Robert Pires was the star of the night in France , scoring the first hat-trick of the league season in Metz 's 3-1 home victory over neighbouring Strasbourg .|||O O B-PER O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG O O O O O O B-ORG O
Pires , one of the most promising strikers in the country , was called up for the first time this week by French manager Aime Jacquet for a friendly against Mexico on Saturday at the Parc des Princes .|||B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O B-PER I-PER O O O O B-LOC O O O O B-LOC I-LOC I-LOC O
Pires scored first with a powerful shot in the 35th minute before striking again from close range just before the break .|||B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
A solitary raid allowed him to score his third in the 74th .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Smicer 's goal was as hard-won as his team 's victory .|||B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O
Spurred by Foe 's leveller five minutes before , Lens pressed hard and Foe hit the crossbar in the dying seconds on another header .|||O O B-PER O O O O O O B-ORG O O O B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O
The ball bounced back to Smicer 's feet and he scored .|||O O O O O B-PER O O O O O O
Montpellier seized an unexpected lead thanks to Kader Ferhaoui in the fourth minute after a blunder from Lens goalkeeper Jean-Claude Nadon .|||B-ORG O O O O O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O B-ORG O B-PER I-PER O
The side from northern France , forced to fight an uphill battle from then on , pulled level thanks to Tony Vairelles in the eighth minute but young striker Fabien Lefevre made it two for Montpellier five minutes later .|||O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER O O O O B-ORG O O O O
Ironically , PSG 's victory owed a lot to two former Nantes players , striker Patrice Loko , who scored on a brilliant shot in the 33rd minute , and defender Benoit Cauet , who started the one-two which allowed Loko to score .|||O O B-ORG O O O O O O O O B-ORG O O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O B-PER O O O
The Parisians , who have yet to concede a goal , were without Brazil 's Leonardo and Panama 's Julio Cesar Dely Valdes , both called up by their national sides .|||O B-MISC O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC O B-PER O B-LOC O B-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O
For Nantes , who shocked PSG to win the league crown two years ago , the fall is very painful .|||O B-ORG O O O B-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
The Canaries , who lost most of their key players within two years , have yet to win a match this season .|||B-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Reigning champions Auxerre had to settle for a goalless draw against Marseille on Tuesday .|||O O B-ORG O O O O O O O O B-ORG O O O

ATHLETICS - CHRISTIE AND JOHNSON ASKED TO JOIN OWENS ' TRIBUTE .|||O O B-PER O B-PER O O O B-PER O O O
BONN 1996-08-28|||B-LOC O
Organisers hope to persuade Britain 's former Olympic 100 metres champion Linford Christie to join a " Dream Team " sprint relay in a special tribute to Jesse Owens at Friday 's Berlin grand prix .|||O O O O B-LOC O O B-MISC O O O B-PER I-PER O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER O O O B-LOC O O O
Christie , who is retiring from international competition at the end of the season , was not due to compete in the German capital but Berlin promoter Rudi Thiel said : " We are still hopeful of getting him to come . "|||B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O B-LOC O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Thiel has managed to get most of the Olympic 100 metres champions since 1948 to attend the meeting , which is being held in the stadium where Owens won four gold medals 60 years ago at the Berlin Olympics .|||B-PER O O O O O O O B-MISC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER O O O O O O O O O B-LOC B-MISC O
" Most of the Olympic champions of the past are coming including Britain 's ( 1980 champion ) Allan Wells .|||O O O O B-MISC O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O O B-PER I-PER O
Christie belongs to them .|||B-PER O O O O
It would be great to have him here .|||O O O O O O O O O
" There is a good offer ....|||O O O O O O O
My minimum would be that he just ran the relay , " he said .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
The 36-year-old Briton is still considering the offer and is expected to announce his decision later on Wednesday .|||O O B-MISC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Owens 's widow Ruth is not well enough to attend but a message from her will be read out during the meeting and one of the sprinter 's relatives is expected to attend .|||B-PER O O B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
The relay race , which will include squads from Africa , the United States and Europe as well as the Owens ' quartet , will be held at the end of the meeting .|||O O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O B-LOC I-LOC O B-LOC O O O O B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Organisers had hoped to include 1984 and 1988 champion Carl Lewis in the squad but he injured himself in Brussels last Friday .|||O O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O
-DOCSTART-|||O
CRICKET - NEW CAPTAIN TENDULKAR UPSTAGED BY 120 FROM JAYASURIYA .|||O O O O B-PER O O O O B-PER O
Sachin Tendulkar marked his debut as Indian captain with a patient 110 on Wednesday , but was upstaged by dashing Sri Lankan opener Sanath Jayasuriya whose 120 steered the world champions to a nine-wicket Singer Cup win .|||B-PER I-PER O O O O B-MISC O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC I-MISC O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O B-MISC I-MISC O O
Sri Lanka , playing in front of their home crowd for the first time since winning the World Cup last March , comfortably passed India 's modest 226-5 from 50 overs in 44.2 overs .|||B-LOC I-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC I-MISC O O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O
Jayasuriya , whose first 50 included three sixes and three fours , went on to an unbeaten 120 and the man-of-the-match award .|||B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Kaluwitharana , slow in comparison , was bowled by Tendulkar for 53 , but Aravinda de Silva with 49 not out helped see Sri Lanka home .|||B-PER O O O O O O O O B-PER O O O O B-PER I-PER I-PER O O O O O O B-LOC I-LOC O O
Earlier , Tendulkar completed his ninth century in one-day cricket , taking 138 balls to do it before being run out .|||O O B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
The rest of the Indian batting was generally tied down by brilliant fielding and some fairly tight bowling , although ex-captain Mohamed Azharuddin chipped in with 58 , adding 129 with Tendulkar off 28 overs , before being stumped .|||O O O O B-MISC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O B-PER O O O O O O O O
The next match in the four-nation tournament is on Friday when Sri Lanka play Australia in a repeat of the World Cup final in Lahore where Sri Lanka won by seven wickets .|||O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC I-LOC O B-LOC O O O O O B-MISC I-MISC O O B-LOC O B-LOC I-LOC O O O O O
-DOCSTART-|||O
CRICKET - SRI LANKA BEAT INDIA BY 9 WICKETS IN ONE-DAY MATCH .|||O O B-LOC I-LOC O B-LOC O O O O O O O
COLOMBO 1996-08-28|||B-LOC O
Sri Lanka beat India by nine wickets in the second match of the Singer World Series one-day ( 50 overs ) cricket tournament on Monday .|||B-LOC I-LOC O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O B-MISC I-MISC I-MISC O O O O O O O O O O

S.AFRICAN TRUTH BODY TO SUMMON APARTHEID POLICE .|||B-MISC O O O O O O O
CAPE TOWN 1996-08-28|||B-LOC I-LOC O
South Africa 's Truth and Reconciliation Commission said on Wednesday it would subpoena persons accused of human rights violations to appear before it .|||B-LOC I-LOC O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
" We can subpoena anyone we want to , even the president of the country , " spokesman John Allen told Reuters . "|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER O B-ORG O O
Subpoenas are due to be served on a number of people this week . "|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Media reports have speculated that the commission , which is trying to heal the wounds of apartheid by confronting the past , could subpoena apartheid-era President P.W. Botha and former police generals Basie Smit and Johan Van Der Merwe .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER O O O O B-PER I-PER O B-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER O
In submissions last week to the commission National Party leader and former president F.W. De Klerk said he had received no co-operation from Botha in compiling his party 's report .|||O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O O O O B-PER I-PER I-PER O O O O O O O B-PER O O O O O O O
Since it began work in April the commission has been hearing harrowing tales from the victims of apartheid-era abuses , by both the white minority regime and its opponents .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
It also wants to hear from those who committed the abuses , to whom it can offer amnesty in return for frankness .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Hopes that reformed perpetrators would come forward voluntarily have faded but the commission has the legal power to force them to appear .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Allen declined to give say who would be subpoenaed .|||B-PER O O O O O O O O O
" At the moment we have a preliminary list of less than 10 people , but this is just the beginning , " he said .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

TURKISH AIRPLANE LANDS IN SOFIA ON BOMB THREAT .|||B-MISC O O O B-LOC O O O O
A Turkish airliner on flight from Istanbul to Vienna on Wednesday landed in emergency at Sofia airport after receiving a bomb threat , said an airport official .|||O B-MISC O O O O B-LOC O B-LOC O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O
" The plane landed at Sofia airport at 1503 ( 1203 GMT ) after receiving a signal that there is an explosive on board , " the official , who declined to be named told Reuters .|||O O O O O B-LOC O O O O O B-MISC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG O
The plane , surrounded by 11 fire-engines , is being checked for explosives at the moment .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Nothing has been found so far , added the official .|||O O O O O O O O O O O
In March a Turkish Cypriot airliner hijacked while on a flight from northern Cyprus to Istanbul landed in Sofia airport to refuel before landing in Munich , where the hijacker was arrested .|||O O O B-MISC I-MISC O O O O O O O O B-LOC O B-LOC O O B-LOC O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O
-DOCSTART-|||O
Arch Alberta well tests 1,100 bbl / day .|||B-ORG B-LOC O O O O O O O
FORT WORTH , Texas 1996-08-28|||B-LOC I-LOC O B-LOC O
Arch Petroleum Inc said Wednesday an exploratory well in Alberta 's Morinville area tested in excess of 1,100 barrels daily and will begin production immediately .|||B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O B-LOC O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
The company said the 90 percent owned Trax et al Morinville 10-23 logged 28 feet of productive Leduc Reef at 5,350 feet .|||O O O O O O O B-MISC I-MISC I-MISC I-MISC I-MISC O O O O O B-LOC I-LOC O O O O
The Trax well is one of the prospects developed by Arch through its early 1996 purchase of Trax Petroleums Ltd , the company said .|||O B-LOC O O O O O O O O B-ORG O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG O O O O O
It said another , the Cometra et al Morinville 11-13 , has logged 128 feet of productive Leduc Reef at 5,400 feet and is flowing water free at the rate of 590 barrels of oil per day on a 15 / 64ths-inch choke .|||O O O O O B-MISC I-MISC I-MISC I-MISC I-MISC O O O O O O O B-LOC I-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Arch said full production has begun and initial estimates of gross reserves attributable to this well range up to one million barrels of oil .|||B-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
A third well drilled in this area , the Trax et al Morinville 2-25 , encountered the Leduc Reef but tested wet .|||O O O O O O O O O B-MISC I-MISC I-MISC I-MISC I-MISC O O O B-LOC I-LOC O O O O
At the company 's Nordegg prospect , the Apache et al Saunders 14-28 , has reached total depth in the Leduc Reef at approximately 3,800 feet and has been abandoned , Arch said .|||O O O O B-MISC O O O B-MISC I-MISC I-MISC I-MISC I-MISC O O O O O O O B-LOC I-LOC O O O O O O O O O B-ORG O O
It said this acreage earning well brought an interest in an additional 5,120 acres , building the company 's gross land position in this area to 8,320 acres .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Testing has begun and results will be announced within the next several days , Arch said .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG O O
Including the costs of the two abandoned wells , the company said , these first prospects have added to reserves at a finding cost of about U.S. $ 2 per barrel of oil equivalent .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O
-- Jim Brumm 212-859-1710 .|||O B-PER I-PER O O

U.S. judge orders Biogen , Berlex officials deposed .|||B-LOC O O B-ORG O B-ORG O O O
Leslie Gevirtz|||B-PER I-PER
The tempest beyond the test tube involves allegations that the U.S. Food and Drug Administration violated the Orphan Drug law by allowing Biogen the right to sell its multiple sclerosis drug Avonex .|||O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG O O B-MISC I-MISC I-MISC O O B-ORG O O O O O O O O B-MISC O
Both drugs are types of interferon .|||O O O O O O O
my understanding of the marketplace is that they 're below expectations . "|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O
He added Chiron Corp reported its sales of inventory to Berlex was down .|||O O B-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O B-ORG O O O
Chiron makes Betaseron ; Berlex markets it , he said .|||B-ORG O B-MISC O B-ORG O O O O O O
When it approved Avonex in May , the FDA said both Biogen 's product and Betaseron were developed under the incentives of the Ophran Drug Act which provides seven years of marketing exclusivity for products that treat rare diseases .|||O O O B-MISC O O O O B-ORG O O B-ORG O O O B-MISC O O O O O O O B-MISC I-MISC I-MISC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Avonex " has been allowed to enter the market because it differs from interferon beta-1b ( Betaseron ) ..|||B-MISC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O
. "|||O O
the FDA said .|||O B-ORG O O
Now , U.S. District Judge Mark Wolf has ordered the chief counsel for Biogen , Michael Astrue , and Robert Chabora , his counterpart at Berlex be deposed about a May 21 meeting the two men attended to help him determine whether the lawsuit filed by Biogen against Berlex should be heard in Massachusetts .|||O O B-LOC O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O B-ORG O B-PER I-PER O O B-PER I-PER O O O O B-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG O B-ORG O O O O B-LOC O
Berlex filed a lawsuit against Biogen in U.S. District Court in Newark , N.J. in July , but Biogen had already filed a suit against Berlex in Massachusetts in May .|||B-ORG O O O O B-ORG O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG O B-LOC O B-LOC O O O O B-ORG O O O O O O B-ORG O B-LOC O O O
Wolf ordered the depositions to determine if he or U.S. District Judge John Bissell of Newark should preside over the case .|||B-PER O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O B-PER I-PER O B-LOC O O O O O O

U.S. copper service center shipments stable - CBSA .|||B-LOC O O O O O O B-ORG O
NEW YORK 1996-08-28|||B-LOC I-LOC O
Average daily shipments from U.S. copper service centers in July fell three percent from the previous month , but were higher than in July 1995 , the Copper and Brass Servicenter Association reported .|||O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG O O
" July was still above the historic average for that month , " the CBSA said .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG O O
In the first seven months of 1996 , shipments of copper sheet , coil and strip were 2.2 percent ahead of the same period last year .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Alloy shipments , however , were 7.5 percent down .|||O O O O O O O O O O
" Several service centers indicated that while their volume of orders remains constant , the size-per-order continues to be smaller than what was realised during the first five months of the year , " the CBSA said .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG O O

1768 - Francois-Rene ( Vicomte de ) Chateaubriand born .|||O O B-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER I-PER O O
He was a politician , one of the first French romantic writers and ambassador to the British court .|||O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O O O O O B-MISC O O
He wrote " Rene " , a seminal work in the French romantic movement and a famous autobiography " Memoires d'Outre Tombe " .|||O O O B-MISC O O O O O O O B-MISC O O O O O O O B-MISC I-MISC I-MISC O O

1870 - In France , the Second Empire was ended and Napoleon III was deposed after his surrender two days earlier in the Franco-Prussian war .|||O O O B-LOC O O B-MISC I-MISC O O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O

He wrote a jazz ballet " La Creation du Monde " and scores for many films including an early version of " Madame Bovary " .|||O O O O O O B-MISC I-MISC I-MISC I-MISC O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC I-MISC O O

1995 - Declaring " united Jerusalem is ours " , Israel launched a 15-month celebration of the 3,000th anniversary of King David 's proclamation of the city as the capital of the Jewish people .|||O O O O O B-LOC O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O B-PER O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O
The British government on Wednesday lowered the noise limits for London 's Heathrow , Gatwick and Stansted airports and announced it would make a bigger effort in detecting and fining violators .|||O B-MISC O O O O O O O O B-LOC O B-LOC O B-LOC O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
The limits , effective from January 1 , 1997 , are reduced as much as possible while still complying with international obligations , a spokesman for the Department of Transport said .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG O O
The maximum noise level during the day is trimmed by three decibels to 94 , while the night time level is reduced by two decibels to 87 .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
" It is a smaller reduction in terms of loudness than was sought by local people .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Nevertheless I am satisfied that the overall benefits will be worthwile , " Lord Goschen , minister for aviation , said in a statement .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER O O O O O O O O O O
The ministry said it believed the new limits could be met with existing aircraft . "|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
They can be flown in quieter ways , " a spokesman said .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O
The reduction in noise levels is the same as proposed in a consultation paper which was published in October 1995 .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
The present noise levels have applied at Heathrow , one of the world 's busiest airports , since 1959 and at Gatwick since 1968 .|||O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O
The number of monitors will be increased and some will be repositioned to detect noisy planes .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
-- London Newsroom +44 171 542 7717|||O B-ORG I-ORG O O O O

" It was confusing , they had no experience of voting , many of the refugees are only semi-literate and none of them knew anything about the candidates , " he said .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
" They just voted along ethnic lines where they could . "|||O O O O O O O O O O O O
The Organisation for Security and Cooperation in Europe , which is running the election , allowed the ballot to be held on Sunday in four Hungarian refugee camps .|||O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O O
Some Moslem refugees among the 385 registered voters Hungary 's largest camp Nagyatad have written to the OSCE complaining that they were unable to vote in contests for the president or assembly of the Bosnian-Croat Federation , where most Moslems live .|||O B-MISC O O O O O O B-LOC O O O B-LOC O O O O B-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC I-LOC O O O B-MISC O O
This was because their pre-war homes are now in the Serb-controlled territory , so they were voting for the national assembly of the Republika Srbska , most of the candidates for which are Serbs .|||O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC I-LOC O O O O O O O O B-MISC O
But Adem Hodzic , one of the refugees who signed the letter of complaint , told Reuters :|||O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG O
" We only realised after voting that we were being denied the rights of other Bosnian Moslems to choose our president .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC I-MISC O O O O O
This vote seals the division of my country . "|||O O O O O O O O O O
Under the election rules citizens vote for a three-man presidency and House of Representatives for all Bosnia-Hercegovina and for assemblies and cantonal seats in either the Moslem-Croat Federation or the Republika Srbska .|||O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O B-LOC I-LOC O O B-LOC I-LOC O
On Sunday voters in Hungary also cast ballots for municipal councils but these will be invalidated following the cancellation of local elections by the OSCE on Tuesday .|||O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG O O O
" Probably 100 refugees were shown where to put their cross , " he said .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

I do n't know who I voted for . "|||O O O O O O O O O O

Estonia will hold the next round of an inconclusive state presidential race on September 20 , parliamentary officers of the Baltic state ruled on Wednesday .|||B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O O O O
This comes after three votes in the 101-strong parliament on Monday and Tuesday failed to give either incumbent Lennart Meri or rival candidate Arnold Ruutel the necessary 68 votes for a clear mandate .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER O O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O
The outcome was a rebuff for Meri , failing three times to win backing in his bid for a second term as head of state of the former Soviet republic .|||O O O O O O B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O
Parliament 's press officer told Reuters that Speaker Toomas Savi will convene an electoral college involving 101 MPs and and 273 local government representatives on September 20 .|||O O O O O B-ORG O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Both Meri , 67 , and Ruutel , 68 will automatically be listed as candidates but the election will also be open to new nominations with the backing of any 21 members of the college .|||O B-PER O O O O B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
The winner has to secure a majority from the college within two rounds of voting otherwise the election will go back before the parliament .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

Lebed , who has arranged a military truce with separatist rebels in the southern Russia region , was in Moscow this week seeking support for a deal on Chechnya 's political status .|||B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O
But Russian President Boris Yeltsin has seemed unwilling to meet his envoy and went on holiday on Monday .|||O B-MISC O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Gazeta Wyborcza quoted Rosati as saying Yeltsin was very ill and effectively on leave , but for now retained control in Russia although matters were passing into the hands of his close collaborators .|||B-ORG I-ORG O B-PER O O B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O

Six-month expenditures stood at 9.50 trillion lei , up from 7.56 trillion lei at end-May , with education and health spending accounting for 31.6 percent of state expenses and economic subsidies and support taking some 26 percent .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Romania 's government is expected to revise the 1996 budget on Wednesday to bring it into line with higher inflation , new wage and pension indexations and costs of energy imports that have pushed up the state deficit .|||B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

No new deficit forecast has been issued so far .|||O O O O O O O O O O

WHEAT--Rains boost U.S. HRW planting prospects .|||O O B-LOC O O O O
Greg Frost|||B-PER I-PER
KANSAS CITY , Mo .|||B-LOC I-LOC O B-LOC O
1996-08-28|||O
Above-normal summer rainfall in the U.S. High Plains has produced near-ideal conditions for planting the 1997 hard red winter wheat crop , analysts said Wednesday .|||O O O O O B-LOC B-LOC I-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
From central Texas north to Kansas , rains throughout July and August have relieved most of the drought conditions that plagued the region earlier this year .|||O O B-LOC O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
" Our moisture situation is excellent , especially for fall planting of winter wheat , " said Kim Anderson , extension wheat marketing economist at Oklahoma State University .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG O
The irony of the above-average summer rainfall was not lost on High Plains wheat producers , who only three months ago were caught in a drought so severe that old-timers likened conditions to the " Dust Bowl " days of the 1930s .|||O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC I-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC I-MISC O O O O O O
Hopefully that 's not going to happen this year . "|||O O O O O O O O O O O
According to figures released by the Oklahoma Climatological Survey , an average of 20.19 inches fell across the state between March 1 and August 26 , 1996 .|||O O O O O O B-MISC I-MISC I-MISC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
That 's about 1/2 inch above the average for the same time period , according to Howard Johnson , associate state climatologist at the University of Oklahoma .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG O
He noted that the majority of that 20.19 inches had fallen since July .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
As an example of just how dry it was , data showed that between October 1 , 1995 and March 1 , 1996 , the state received an average of only 4.6 inches of rainfall .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
In northern Texas , the current rainfall situation was similar to most of Oklahoma , said Rodney Mosier , executive assistant for the Texas Wheat Producers .|||O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG O
" Up here in the Texas Panhandle , we 've had some extremely beneficial rains that came through within the last several days and are really setting us up for ideal conditions for planting wheat , " Mosier said .|||O O O O O B-LOC I-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER O O
In Kansas , typically the number one U.S. hard red winter wheat producer , topsoil moisture levels were rated mostly adequate during the week ended Sunday , according to the state 's agricultural statistics service .|||O B-LOC O O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
In its weekly report released Monday , the service said Kansas topsoil moisture was rated eight percent surplus , 77 percent adequate and 15 percent short to very short .|||O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
-DOCSTART-|||O
First Union National Bank of Fla. settles suit .|||B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG O O O
First Union National Bank of Florida said on Wednesday it agreed to settle a class action law suit involving its collateral protection insurance ( CPI ) program .|||B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O O
To provide for the settlements , First Union has established a common fund of $ 4.7 million for cash refunds and $ 19.4 million in credit refunds for outstanding CPI balances .|||O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O
The bank is a division of First Union Corp .|||O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG O
The bank said most of the charges resulted from loan portfolios from banks and thrifts that were acquired in the 1980s .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
As part of the settlement agreement , customers who had CPI placed on loans from January 1 , 1986 to September 31 , 1996 , will receive cash or credit refunds , the bank said .|||O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Cash refunds will go to those who paid their loans to First Union while credit refunds will go to those who have existing loan balances , the bank said .|||O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

We can neither confirm nor deny that report , " he said .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O
S-1 in the former South Yemen , which united with North Yemen in 1990 .|||B-MISC O O O B-LOC I-LOC O O O O B-LOC I-LOC O O O
The officials said Amoco was deferring to the Yemeni Ministry of Petroleum and Minerals for any specific comments on the Amoco-Yemen talks .|||O O O B-ORG O O O O B-MISC B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O B-MISC O O

Burundi defends military regime to hostile UN .|||B-LOC O O O O O B-ORG O
UNITED NATIONS 1996-08-28|||B-ORG I-ORG O
Burundi 's ambassador on Wednesday lashed out at economic sanctions imposed by African states and said any thought of an arms embargo would be a windfall for guerrillas fighting his army-run government .|||B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
In a lengthy debate on Burundi before the U.N. Security Council , Ambassador Nsanze Terence said the new military government took over to stabilise the country and wanted negotiations under former Tanzanian President Julius Nyrere .|||O O O O O B-LOC O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O B-PER I-PER O
Nearly every African member who spoke , as well as most Security Council members , however , were unsympathetic towards the government of President Pierre Buyoya , an army major put in power in a July coup by the Tutsi-run military , which is locked in a guerrilla war with the majority Hutus .|||O O B-MISC O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O
Quite the contrary , Burundi has seen economic war declared against it by fellow African people ... a gratuitous immolation of the people of Burundi . "|||O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O
He said his government had just asked U.N. human rights monitors to increase their numbers in Burundi in an effort " to put an end to this vicious circle of violence . "|||O O O O O O O B-ORG O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
More than 150,000 people have been killed in violence between the minority Tutsis and the majority Hutus since 1993 .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O O B-MISC O O O
Botswana 's envoy , Mothusi Nkgowe , said coups should be relegated " to the dump heap of history " as there could be no justification for the overthrow of a legitimate government .|||B-LOC O O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Terence , a Tutsi , said any arms embargo would leave the army unable to defend itself against Hutu guerrillas and leave the population exposed to " armed terroritsts . "|||B-PER O O B-MISC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O O O O O O O O O O O
But Chilean Ambassador Juan Somavia said : " Every weapon that reached Burundi is a weapon aimed mainly at killing an unarmed civilian .|||O B-MISC O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O
We must not send a signal different from the African leaders themselves .|||O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O O
Inaction is becoming the worst possible course of action . "|||O O O O O O O O O O O
Burundi 's parliament has been suspended and political parties are banned but Terence told reporters Buyoya would reconvene a new type of national assembly in October .|||B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER O O B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O
The United States said the coup leaders had taken no steps to restore democracy and indiscriminate killings continued .|||O B-LOC I-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Ambassador Karl Inderfurth said the new government should have " unconditional " negotiations with all parties inside and outside of the country .|||O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
But he said the international community had to be prepared for the worst and avoid a replay of the horrors in neighbouring Rwanda , where widespread genocide broke out against the Tutsis two years ago .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O O O
He again said the United Nations should draw up contingency plans for a rapid humanitarian intervention .|||O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O

Arafat says Israel declares war on Palestinians .|||B-PER O B-LOC O O O B-MISC O
Wafa Amr|||B-PER I-PER
RAMALLAH , West Bank 1996-08-28|||B-LOC O B-LOC I-LOC O
Palestinian President Yasser Arafat said on Wednesday that Israel had declared war on the Palestinians and called for the first general strike in the West Bank and Gaza in two years .|||B-MISC O B-PER I-PER O O O O B-LOC O O O O O B-MISC O O O O O O O O O B-LOC I-LOC O B-LOC O O O O
" What happened concerning continuous violations and crimes from this new Israeli leadership means they are declaring a state of war against the Palestinian people , " Arafat told the Palestinian legislature .|||O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O O B-PER O O B-MISC O O
The tirade was sparked by Israel 's announcement on Tuesday of plans to expand the Jewish settlement of Kiryat Sefer and its demolishing of a community centre in Arab East Jerusalem .|||O O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O B-LOC I-LOC O O O O O O O O B-LOC I-LOC I-LOC O
" Israel has started the war on Jerusalem .|||O B-LOC O O O O O B-LOC O
They are idiots to have started the Jerusalem battle , " Arafat said in Arabic . "|||O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O B-PER O O B-MISC O O
There will be no Palestinian state without Jerusalem .|||O O O O B-MISC O O B-LOC O
Arafat called for a general strike " for Jerusalem " on Thursday in all of the West Bank and Gaza Strip .|||B-PER O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O B-LOC I-LOC O B-LOC I-LOC O
There has not been a joint shutdown there since May 1994 when Israeli troops began withdrawing under an interim self-rule agreement signed in 1993 .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O O O O O O O O O O O
Some 25,000 Palestinian labourers are likely to stay away from their jobs , mainly in construction , in Israel .|||O O B-MISC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC O
But Palestinians , once the backbone of the building industry , have been largely replaced by labourers from Romania and China .|||O B-MISC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC O B-LOC O
" On Friday , all Moslems , including Palestinians in Israel ...|||O O O O O B-MISC O O B-MISC O B-LOC O
Jews and Christians who do not pray should accompany them and stand behind them , " Arafat said .|||B-MISC O B-MISC O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER O O
Officials in Netanyahu 's office were not immediately available for comment on Arafat 's remarks .|||O O B-PER O O O O O O O O O B-PER O O O
Israeli travel restrictions , imposed after bombings by Moslem militants in February and March , ban most of the two million Arabs in the West Bank and Gaza from entering Jerusalem .|||B-MISC O O O O O O O B-MISC O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O B-LOC I-LOC O B-LOC O O B-LOC O
Netanyahu , who opposes trading occupied land for peace , made Jerusalem a central issue in his election campaign , accusing Labour Prime Minister Shimon Peres of planning to hand control of the Arab eastern part of the city to the Palestinians .|||B-PER O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O B-ORG O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O B-MISC O O O O O O O B-MISC O
Israel captured East Jerusalem in the 1967 Middle East war and claims both halves of the city as its capital .|||B-LOC O B-LOC I-LOC O O O B-LOC I-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O
The PLO wants East Jerusalem as the capital of a future Palestinian state .|||O B-ORG O B-LOC I-LOC O O O O O O B-MISC O O
In his speech to the crowded legislature , Arafat signalled he was not abandoning diplomacy although " alarm bells are ringing " .|||O O O O O O O O B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
He unexpectedly broke off his address to take a telephone call from U.S. Middle East envoy Dennis Ross , who held talks in Paris on Tuesday with Israeli and Egyptian officials .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC I-LOC I-LOC O B-PER I-PER O O O O O B-LOC O O O B-MISC O B-MISC O O
When Arafat returned to the podium , he said senior PLO negotiator Mahmoud Abbas , better known as Abu Mazen , and Netanyahu aide Dore Gold could meet on Thursday .|||O B-PER O O O O O O O O B-ORG O B-PER I-PER O O O O B-PER I-PER O O B-PER O B-PER I-PER O O O O O
He quoted Ross as telling him : " The important thing is the Israelis are prepared to move . "|||O O B-PER O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O O O O O
Arafat said he replied : " is this like their previous promises ? "|||B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O
" No , they have good intentions , " Arafat quoted Ross as saying .|||O O O O O O O O O B-PER O B-PER O O O
Palestinians have been pressing Israel to carry out a long-delayed partial troop pullout from the flashpoint West Bank city of Hebron agreed by the previous Labour government .|||B-MISC O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC I-LOC O O B-LOC O O O O B-ORG O O
The Israeli government is studying redeployment plans submitted by Defence Minister Yitzhak Mordechai which are likely to demand a wider than agreed army presence in Hebron .|||O B-MISC O O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC O

Former Colorado Democratic Gov .|||O B-LOC B-MISC O O

CNN quoted aides and family members as saying Lamm , who competed with Perot to head the ticket for Perot 's party , had told them he would definitely not endorse Perot , but they did not know whether he would endorse another candidate .|||B-ORG O O O O O O O B-PER O O O O B-PER O O O O O B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O
An announcement was planned in Chicago Wednesday .|||O O O O O B-LOC O O
Lamm , 60 , is a three-term Colorado governor who left office in 1987 and vied for the Reform Party nomination after becoming disillusioned with both the Democratic and Republican parties .|||B-PER O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O O B-MISC O B-MISC O O

Patricia Vowinkel|||B-PER I-PER
NEW YORK 1996-08-27|||B-LOC I-LOC O
A U.S. appeals court on Tuesday gave Lloyd 's a reprieve , throwing out an injunction that the insurance giant said could have led to its collapse .|||O B-LOC O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
A lower court issued the injunction on Friday and ordered Lloyd 's to give investors , known as Names , more information before requiring them to decide whether to accept a settlement offer as part of a reorganisation plan .|||O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O B-MISC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
" At this point , it is a sufficiently important decision that I 'm confident that they will appeal , " he said . "|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
But to say that they definitely will would be premature until we determine what the exact basis for the court 's ruling is . "|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Under the reorganisation plan , Lloyd 's plans to reinsure its massive liabilities into a new company called Equitas .|||O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG O
At least eight U.S. states have still some form of litigation pending , said John Head , spokesman for the Association of Lloyd 's State Chairmen , a group representing U.S. Names .|||O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER O O O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O B-LOC B-MISC O
" It goes without saying that we 're rather disappointed , " Head said of the decision by the U.S. Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit , sitting in Baltimore .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG O O B-ORG I-ORG O O O B-LOC O
But , he said , " we still have hope that somebody is going to see our point of view in this . "|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
In addition , she said she was concerned the plan may not offer investors enough protection from additional , future liabilities .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Meanwhile , an appeal of a lawsuit filed by some 600 Names in California is still pending before the U.S. Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit , Chiate of the American Names Association said .|||O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O B-LOC O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG O O B-ORG I-ORG O B-PER O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG O O
That lawsuit , which seeks rescision and restitution , was dismissed in a U.S. district court .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O
That case " is what I call the most significant alternate remedy for us , " Chiate said .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER O O
The individual Names , however , now must decide whether to accept Lloyd 's settlement offer or reject the offer and pursue litigation .|||O O B-MISC O O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O O O O O
Chiate said he has advised Names that " they must make , individually , a risk benefit analysis . "|||B-PER O O O O B-MISC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Rejection involved forfeiting the compensation offer and risking the possibility of owing Lloyd 's two to three times more than Lloyd 's is now willing to accept , he said .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O O O O
But , in rejecting the offer , the Names would retain their rights to pursue litigation , he said .|||O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O O O O O O O O O O

-DOCSTART-|||O
Revellers painted the town red on Wednesday as the 1996 edition of the world 's biggest tomato fight began in the eastern Spanish village of Bunol .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O B-LOC O
Thousands of people pelted each other with armfuls of ripe tomatoes as streets , walls and windows were coated in a blood-red wash .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
A single firework after midday signalled the start of the fruit-throwing frenzy , during which participants hurl some 100 tonnes of tomatoes trucked in for the occasion .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Local historians say the tradition began in 1945 when disgruntled locals began spontaneously to bombard the priest and mayor at the annual fiesta in Bunol ( pronounced Boo-nee-OL ) .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O B-LOC O O
The festival 's fame has grown and now attracts between 15,000 and 20,000 people , many of them foreigners .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

NZ bills gain ground after see-saw session .|||B-LOC O O O O O O O
0515 GMT|||O B-MISC
The New Zealand money market gained slightly at Wednesday 's close after what dealers described as a see-saw trading session .|||O B-LOC I-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Ninety-day bank bill rates shed five points to 9.93 percent and September bank bill futures rose four to 90.18 .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
However , bonds finished largely flat .|||O O O O O O O
" Our bonds were better bid initially but they sold off on a lack of demand , and the short end went with it too on a lower currency .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Volumes were reasonable in the money market but thin in bonds .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O
Dealers said the market seemed to be trading a range and would wait for more political polls to provide direction .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
They were confident of further eurokiwi issuance but said the timing was less of a certainty .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

TOKYO 1996-08-28|||B-LOC O
The leader of a junior partner in Japan 's three-party ruling coalition plans to resign to quell a political rebellion , party officials said on Wednesday .|||O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
They said the date of Takemura 's resignation would be determined by party officials .|||O O O O O B-PER O O O O O O O O O
The Sakigake row has caused jitters in its coalition partners , Prime Minister Ryutaro Hashimoto 's Liberal Democratic Party ( LDP ) , the biggest grouping , and the Social Democratic Party .|||O B-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG O B-ORG O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG O
The dispute pits Takemura , who founded Sakigake in 1993 as a reform-oriented LDP splinter group , against party official Yukio Hatoyama , who says he will leave Sakigake to form a reformist political group next month .|||O O O B-PER O O O B-ORG O O O O O B-ORG O O O O O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O B-ORG O O O O O O O O O
Hatoyama , the 49-year-old grandson of a 1950s prime minister , on Tuesday quit as Sakigake secretary general and has publicly snubbed the 62-year-old Takemura , pointedly ruling his mentor out as a possible member of the new political force .|||B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG O O O O O O O O B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Media reports say that at most 10 of 23 Sakigake members , joined by a handful of Social Democrats , will follow Hatoyama when he bolts -- far short of the 50 lawmakers needed to topple Hashimoto 's eight-month-old government .|||O O O O O O O O O B-ORG O O O O O O O B-MISC I-MISC O O O B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER O O O O
Hashimoto -- who returns from a 10-day Latin American tour on Saturday -- must call polls by mid-1997 , and has repeatedly said he would not call an early general election .|||B-PER O O O O O O B-MISC I-MISC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
But many analysts and politicians believe he may dissolve parliament soon after it reconvenes in early October .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

ISS says agreed sale of U.S. unit .|||B-ORG O O O O B-LOC O O
COPENHAGEN 1996-08-28|||B-LOC O
Danish cleaning group ISS on Wednesday said it had signed a letter of intent to sell its troubled U.S unit ISS Inc to Canadian firm Aaxis Limited .|||B-MISC O O B-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC O B-ORG I-ORG O B-MISC O B-ORG I-ORG O
An ISS statement said that Aaxis , with year-end 1996 assets of US$ 10.9 million and equity of $ 10.5 million , would be listed on the Montreal stock exchange , but did not say when .|||O B-ORG O O O B-ORG O O O O O O B-MISC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O
It said that under the sale agreement , full financial details of which were not revealed , ISS would acquire a 25 percent stake in Aaxis which would become an associated company within the ISS group trading under the ISS name and logo .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG O O O O O O O B-ORG O O O O O O O O B-ORG O O O O B-ORG O O O O
ISS Inc senior management would continue to run the business under the new owners , it said .|||B-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Danish analysts recently estimated ISS Inc 's sale value at up to $ 118 million .|||B-MISC O O O B-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O O O O O
ISS said that the deal included ISS Inc operations in Mexico and the sale of ISS Inc interests in Brazil would be discussed .|||B-ORG O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O O B-LOC O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O O B-LOC O O O O
On August 15 , ISS published first half 1996 results showing a two billion crown loss caused by falsified accounts in ISS Inc and said that charges and provisions earlier estimated at $ 100 million would have to be increased to $ 146 million .|||O O O O B-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
-DOCSTART-|||O
Iraq balks at U.N. staff for oil-for-food deal .|||B-LOC O O B-ORG O O O O O
Evelyn Leopold|||B-PER I-PER
UNITED NATIONS 1996-08-28|||B-ORG I-ORG O
Iraq has balked at the number of U.N. staff needed to implement the oil-for-food deal , blaming the United States for insisting on stringent monitoring .|||B-LOC O O O O O O B-ORG O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC I-LOC O O O O O O
At issue was a May 20 agreement allowing Iraq to sell $ 2 billion worth of oil to purchase badly needed food , medicine and other supplies to ease the impact of sanctions in force since its troops invaded Kuwait in August 1990 .|||O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O
According to U.N. officials and diplomats , Iraq would have about $ 1.13 billion to spend for food , medicine and other goods after monies for a reparations fund for Gulf War victims and costs for U.N. weapons inspections were deducted .|||O O B-ORG O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC I-MISC O O O O B-ORG O O O O O
The cost of the U.N. staff overseeing the distribution of food and other supplies was estimated to cost $ 31 million .|||O O O O B-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
In addition another $ 12 million was anticipated to cover other expenses , such as oil experts and administrative costs .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
For the distribution and supervision of humanitarian supplies the United Nations estimated it needed 1,190 people , including 267 international staff and 923 Iraqi support staff .|||O O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O O
Of this number 64 foreign and 598 local staff would be in the northern Kurdish provinces , no longer the direct control of the Baghdad government .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O
Another 203 international staff and 325 Iraqis would run the programme in the central and southern parts of the country .|||O O O O O O B-MISC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
There are also 14 monitors to watch oil flows , 32 customs experts and four New York-based oil experts or overseers to approve contracts .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC I-MISC O O O O O O O O
Yasushi Akashi , the DHA undersecretary-general , told the Security Council last week that the " financial requirements to support the ( humanitarian ) programme represent a very modest percentile of the total ...|||B-PER I-PER O O B-ORG O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
roughly 3 percent . "|||O O O O O
-DOCSTART-|||O

-DOCSTART-|||O
BRUSSELS 1996-08-29|||B-LOC O
The European Commission said on Thursday it would study scientific reports saying Britain 's mad cow epidemic would die out by 2001 but offered little prospect the findings would change an agreed slaughter campaign .|||O B-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
We will ask the ( EU ) scientific and veterinary committee to examine it , " Commission spokesman Gerard Kiely told Reuters .|||O O O O O B-ORG O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG O B-PER I-PER O B-ORG O
But he added that new research into the dynamics of the bovine spongiform encephalopathy ( BSE ) , a fatal brain-wasting disease suffered by cattle , was unlikely to alter a slaughter plan agreed by Britain and its 14 EU partners .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O B-ORG O O
" We agreed that following detailed scientific analysis using a methodology which would take out the maximum number of BSE cases possible .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O O
I think it would be very difficult to sell to the European Commission a programme which would involve the elimination of fewer BSE cases , " Kiely said .|||O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O O B-PER O O
" We will look at our approach ( to the plan ) but we wo n't get involved with the number of animals to be slaughtered , " he said .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
" We have always avoided the question of numbers of animals to be slaughtered , that 's not the issue .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
The reaction is likely to disappoint British farmers , who seized on research by Oxford scientists in the scientific journal Nature saying it would be hard to get rid of the disease any faster than 2001 without killing vast numbers of cattle .|||O O O O O O B-MISC O O O O O O O B-ORG O O O O O B-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
The researchers predicted there would be 340 new infections and 14,000 new cases of BSE before 2001 .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O O
British farmers ' leader called on Wednesday for an urgent meeting with ministers to discuss the report .|||B-MISC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
The report could well reopen a damaging row between Britain and the EU , which slapped a worldwide ban on British beef after the government said there could be a link between BSE and the human form of the disease .|||O O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O B-ORG O O O O O O O B-MISC O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O O O O O O O
-DOCSTART-|||O
French farmers set up blockades in mad cow protest .|||B-MISC O O O O O O O O O
PARIS 1996-08-29|||B-LOC O
Radio stations said around 15,000 farmers , angered by a fall in beef prices following the mad cow disease crisis , staged protests in many areas and blockaded several main roads and motorways .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
By 3 a.m. ( 0100 GMT ) more than 2,000 lorries had been stopped and searched .|||O O O O O B-MISC O O O O O O O O O O O

CRICKET - CROFT RESTRICTS PAKISTAN TO 225-5 .|||O O B-PER O B-LOC O O O
MANCHESTER , England 1996-08-29|||B-LOC O B-LOC O
Tight bowling from Glamorgan off-spinner Robert Croft helped England to restrict Pakistan to 225 for five in their 50 overs in the first one-day international at Old Trafford on Thursday .|||O O O B-ORG O B-PER I-PER O B-LOC O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC I-LOC O O O
There was also a wicket each for Ronnie Irani , Allan Mullally and Darren Gough although there was no joy for Dean Headley who , along with Lancashire batsman Graham Lloyd , was making his international debut .|||O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER O B-PER I-PER O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O B-PER I-PER O O O O B-ORG O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O
Anwar , who struck a superb 176 at The Oval , was the more aggressive as he made 57 from 75 balls before skying a catch off Irani to Mullally at long-on .|||B-PER O O O O O O O B-LOC I-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER O B-PER O O O
Sohail and Ijaz Ahmed then added 59 for the second wicket before England struck back with three wickets for 19 in the space of five overs .|||B-PER O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
First , Sohail , after making 48 , was bowled by Croft as he stepped back to try and hit through the off-side .|||O O B-PER O O O O O O O O B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O
Wasim , who promoted himself to number four in the order , followed for six when Croft drifted another well-flighted delivery behind his legs .|||B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER O O O O O O O O
Gough later bowled Moin Khan with an inswinging yorker but Inzamam-ul-Haq , 37 not out , and Salim Malik took Pakistan to 225 for five when the overs ran out .|||B-PER O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O B-PER O O O O O O B-PER I-PER O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O

RUGBY UNION - TELFER CONFIRMED FOR LIONS COACHING ROLE .|||B-ORG I-ORG O B-PER O O B-ORG O O O
LONDON 1996-08-30|||B-LOC O
Scotland 's Jim Telfer was officially confirmed on Thursday as assistant coach for the British Lions tour to South Africa next year .|||B-LOC O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O O B-LOC I-LOC O O O
Telfer , who has put on hold his role as Scotland team manager for a year , will act as assistant to Ian McGeechan .|||B-PER O O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER O
The pair last worked together when Scotland won the Five Nations grand slam in 1990 .|||O O O O O O B-LOC O O B-MISC I-MISC O O O O O
ATHLETICS - CHRISTIE TO RUN IN BERLIN .|||O O B-PER O O O B-LOC O
LONDON 1996-08-29|||B-LOC O
Linford Christie has confirmed he will run in a " Dream Team " sprint relay at the Berlin grand prix athletics meeting on Friday .|||B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O
A spokeswoman for Christie said the former Olympic 100 metres champion had agreed to captain a quality quartet which also includes Canada 's Donovan Bailey , the current Olympic champion and world record holder , and Namibian Frankie Fredericks .|||O O O B-PER O O O B-MISC O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC O B-PER I-PER O O O B-MISC O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER O
Christie is retiring from international competition at the end of the season , but Berlin promoter Rudi Thiel has persuaded him to join what is intended to be a special tribute to Jesse Owens , who won four gold medals 60 years ago at the Berlin Olympics .|||B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC B-MISC O

SOCCER - GROBBELAAR NAMED TEMPORARY ZIMBABWE COACH .|||O O B-PER O O B-LOC O O
England-based goalkeeper Bruce Grobbelaar has been appointed temporary head coach of the Zimbabwe national soccer team for two international matches , the Zimbabwe Football Association ( ZIFA ) said on Thursday .|||B-MISC O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG O B-ORG O O O O O
Grobbelaar takes over until a permanent replacement is appointed for Zimbabwe 's previous coach , Switzerland 's Marc Duvillard .|||B-PER O O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O B-LOC O B-PER I-PER O
Grobbelaar now plays for English second division leaders Plymouth Argyle after years in the top flight with Liverpool and Southampton .|||B-PER O O O B-MISC O O O B-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O O B-ORG O B-ORG O
Grobbelaar , fellow goalkeeper Hans Segers , retired striker John Fashanu and Malaysian businessman Heng Suan Lim pleaded not guilty in May to charges of giving or accepting bribes to fix English premier league matches .|||B-PER O O O B-PER I-PER O O O B-PER I-PER O B-MISC O B-PER I-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O O O
They are due to stand trial next January .|||O O O O O O O O O
