Olympic champions Michael Johnson and Donovan Bailey and former champion Linford Christie will run in a " Dream Team " sprint relay squad in honour of Jesse Owens on Friday .|||B-MISC O B-PER I-PER O B-PER I-PER O O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER O O O
Johnson , the 200 metres world record holder , and Britain 's 1992 Olympic 100 champion Christie confirmed on Thursday that they would join 100 record holder Bailey and Namibia 's Frankie Fredericks in one of the greatest 4x100 squads ever assembled .|||B-PER O O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O B-MISC O O B-PER O O O O O O O O O O B-PER O B-LOC O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O O
They will run against quartets from the United States , Europe and Africa in a special race at the Berlin Grand Prix meeting to mark the 60th anniversary of Owens 's four gold medals at the 1936 Olympics in the German capital .|||O O O O O O O B-LOC I-LOC O B-LOC O B-LOC O O O O O O B-LOC B-MISC I-MISC O O O O O O O B-PER O O O O O O O B-MISC O O B-MISC O O
Christie will run the anchor leg after Canada 's Bailey , American Johnson and Olympic silver medallist Fredericks have run the first three stages of the relay .|||B-PER O O O O O O B-LOC O B-PER O B-MISC B-PER O B-MISC O O B-PER O O O O O O O O O O
The participation of Bailey and Fredericks had been known before Thursday .|||O O O B-PER O B-PER O O O O O O
Christie is due to retire from international competition at the end of the season although he may compete for Britain in next season 's European Cup .|||B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O B-MISC I-MISC O
Although Christie , who is not racing the individual 100 metres in Berlin , took his time to agree to run , the veteran was clearly delighted to be part of the tribute to the black American .|||O B-PER O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O

Zaire installs first election delegates .|||B-LOC O O O O O
KINSHASA 1996-08-29|||B-LOC O
A total of 116 delegates to Zaire 's National Election Commission ( CNE ) were formally installed on Thursday , launching another phase of the Central African nation 's much-delayed democratic transition .|||O O O O O O B-LOC O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG O B-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC I-MISC O O O O O O
The 116 , representing political parties in the capital Kinshasa , will help organise a voter census , a constitutional referendum planned for January and efforts to brief potential voters on what balloting involves .|||O O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
A total of 9,446 delegates will be deployed throughout Zaire 's 11 provinces for the elections , which must be held by July 1997 under the transitional constitution .|||O O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Presidential , parliamentary and municipal elections are planned for May .|||O O O O O O O O O O O
" We can meet the required deadlines for organising the elections .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O
All that is needed is for everyone to show goodwill , " Commission spokesman Yoka Lye Mudaba told reporters .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG O B-PER I-PER I-PER O O O
The installation of delegates was initially scheduled for July .|||O O O O O O O O O O
Officials said lack of funding had delayed the process .|||O O O O O O O O O O
President Mobutu Sese Seko , who seized power in a 1965 coup , introduced a multi-party system in 1990 but Zaire 's transition has lagged well behind that of other states in the region .|||O B-PER I-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
In the past , Mobutu has been elected without opposition .|||O O O O B-PER O O O O O O
Nigeria would not refuse Commonwealth officials .|||B-LOC O O O B-ORG O O
LAGOS 1996-08-29|||B-LOC O
Nigeria would not object to a visit by Commonwealth officials but insists its suspension from the organisation be resolved before any other questions are addressed , Foreign Minister Tom Ikimi said on Thursday .|||B-LOC O O O O O O O B-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER O O O O
Ikimi reiterated his position that the Commonwealth had no mandate to send a fact-finding mission .|||B-PER O O O O O B-ORG O O O O O O O O O
" The request I have received is for their officials to come and talk to my officials .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
We cannot object to people wanting to visit Nigeria , " Ikimi told Reuters by telephone from the capital Abuja .|||O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O B-PER O B-ORG O O O O O B-LOC O
Any discussions we have at ministerial level will be a continuation of what we began in London on that .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O
Before that is accomplished we cannot address anything else . "|||O O O O O O O O O O O
Nigeria was suspended from the Commonwealth in November after the execution of Ken Saro-Wiwa and eight other minority rights activists in defiance of international pleas for clemency .|||B-LOC O O O O B-ORG O O O O O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
A meeting of Commonwealth ministers in London on Wednesday said it planned to send a team of senior officials to Nigeria as soon as possible to persuade Abuja to accept a fact-finding mission .|||O O O B-ORG O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O
The timing of that mission has yet to be determined .|||O O O O O O O O O O O
Nigeria said they would be restricted to a two-day meeting with government officials , but the Commonwealth said it wanted to hold meetings with people outside the government and called off the visit .|||B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

Peter Greste|||B-PER I-PER
BELGRADE 1996-08-29|||B-LOC O
U.S. envoy John Kornblum met Serbian President Slobodan Milosevic on Thursday in an effort to defuse a growing crisis surrounding Bosnia 's post-war elections .|||B-LOC O B-PER I-PER O B-MISC O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O
The American diplomat arrived in Belgrade two days after international organisers postponed municipal elections in Bosnia due to irregularities in the registration of Serb refugee voters .|||O B-MISC O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O B-MISC O O O
Kornblum gave no indication that he had won any specific commitment from Milosevic , the patron of the Bosnian Serbs , to rectify any abuses in the registration process .|||B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER O O O O O B-MISC I-MISC O O O O O O O O O O
Serbian officials have denied any abuses occurred during a 10-day registration period and the Bosnian Serbs , angry at the postponement of municipal elections , have threatened to hold local polls on their territory without the international community 's blessing .|||B-MISC O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC I-MISC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

" As we have said publicly before , if there is any effort to do so ( hold local elections ) these elections will not be valid , " he said . "|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

He was due to head to the Bosnian town of Banja Luka on Friday to meet Bosnian Serb acting president Biljana Plavsic and Bosnian Serb opposition leaders .|||O O O O O O O B-MISC O O B-LOC I-LOC O O O O B-MISC I-MISC O O B-PER I-PER O B-MISC I-MISC O O O

Gazprom rises to 2,901.48 rbls at auction .|||B-ORG O O O O O O O
A stake of 10 million shares in Russian gas monopoly RAO Gazprom was sold at auction on Thursday at an average 2,901.48 roubles a share , up from 2,891.00 roubles a week ago , the Federal Securities Corporation ( FFK ) said .|||O O O O O O O B-MISC O O B-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG O B-ORG O O O
The stake represented 0.042 percent of Gazprom 's capital .|||O O O O O O B-ORG O O O
The FFK said that since auctions began , 139.75 million shares , equivalent to 0.59 percent of Gazprom , have changed hands .|||O B-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG O O O O O
However , its 23.6 billion shares are highly illiquid and management permission is required to sell them .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
The company has organised regular auctions of its shares to create an orderly market in the paper .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
On the Russian Trading System , Gazprom shares rose 25 percent on Thursday to $ 0.375 from $ 0.300 , after falling by over a third earlier this week .|||O O B-MISC I-MISC I-MISC O B-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

Some 170 middle-aged and elderly people with the disease were being treated in hospital , doctors said .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

Illness from viral meningitis lasts around a week .|||O O O O O O O O O
It affects the gastro-intestinal tract , causing high fever , headache and vomiting .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

Venezuela 's non-traditional exports , which exclude oil and iron , rose 10.6 percent in July to reach $ 334 million compared to $ 302 million in June , according to the Central Office of Statistics and Information ( OCEI ) .|||B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG O B-ORG O O

Foreign exchange controls were removed April 22 as part of a wider IMF-sponsored program .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O
Nevertheless , exports over the first seven months of the year were 16.8 percent lower than during the same period last year , at $ 2.240 billion compared to $ 2.693 billion .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
The U.S. followed with a 24.6 percent share .|||O B-LOC O O O O O O O

Thailand 's powerful military thinks the government is dishonest and Prime Minister Banharn Silpa-archa 's resignation might solve the nation 's political and economic woes , an opinion poll showed on Thursday .|||B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
The poll , conducted earlier this month after Banharn 's coalition completed one year in office , showed the military would prefer General Chatichai Choonhavan -- a former prime minister who was ousted in a military coup in February 1991 -- as prime minister .|||O O O O O O O O B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

Banharn came in last on the list of proposed leaders with less than one percent of the votes .|||B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Nearly two-thirds of the people surveyed thought the government was dishonest and insincere , and 65 percent blamed the government 's poor performance for the country 's economic slowdown .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
The opinion of the military in Thailand , which has seen 17 coups or attempted coups since the country switched to parliamentary democracy from absolute monarchy in 1932 , always carries weight in the political scene , despite officials ' vows to distance the military from politics .|||O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

Researchers report progress in muscular dystrophy .|||O O O O O O O
PHILADELPHIA 1996-08-29|||B-LOC O
University of Pennsylvania researchers on Thursday said a new gene-therapy technique for treating muscular dystrophy disease had shown progress in laboratory animals .|||B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Word of the findings , to be published in the Oct. 1 issue of the journal " Human Gene Therapy , " came in advance of the annual Jerry Lewis Labour Day weekend telethon to raise money for muscular dystrophy research .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O O O B-MISC I-MISC I-MISC I-MISC O O O O O O O O O O
Several hurdles must be overcome before the method is used in human trials .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Nevertheless , " a treatment based on the new strategy .... may have the potential to benefit many patients , " the University of Pennsylvania Medical Centre said in a release .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O O
Muscular dystrophy is a fatal illness in which the body 's muscle tissue degenerates and is replaced by fat .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Individuals with the disease have a non-working version of a gene responsible for producing a crucial muscle protein called dystrophin .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
In the study at the University 's Institute for Human Gene Therapy , researchers altered a common-cold virus to carry a version of the working dystrophin gene .|||O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
In the experiment , between 30 to 40 percent of the muscle fibers in one group of mice produced dystrophin for two weeks before diminishing .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Similar results had been obtained previously in test-tube cell cultures , but not in live animals , the university said .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
The university said methods are still needed to make enough of the altered virus to treat humans , to further decrease the immune-system response to the virus , and to deliver the virus to human muscle tissue .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
-DOCSTART-|||O

CHARLESTON , S.C. 1996-08-29|||B-LOC O B-LOC O
Health officials said on Thursday they were investigating the discovery of an amputated foot on a beach near Charleston to determine whether a local surgeon had improperly disposed of infectious waste .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O
The foot , which washed up on Sullivan 's Island beach this month , was amputated three years ago from a child whose legs were deformed .|||O O O O O O O B-LOC I-LOC I-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
The foot had to be removed so the infant could be fitted with a prosthesis .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
An orthopedic surgeon was given permission by the child 's parents and the hospital to keep the foot for research and educational purposes .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Health officials said the surgeon told authorities he stored the foot in his freezer at home , but the freezer recently broke down and the contents spoiled .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
The surgeon , who apologised for the incident , said he decided to put the foot in a crab trap to remove the flesh .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

SALANG TUNNEL , Afghanistan 1996-08-29|||B-LOC O O B-LOC O
The Salang tunnel linking Kabul with northern Afghanistan was formally reopened to traffic on Thursday under an agreement between the government and an opposition militia , witnesses said .|||O B-LOC O O B-LOC O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
They said dozens of trucks began moving through the tunnel from both directions after the road reopened .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
The Salang tunnel , the main supply route for Soviet troops when they were occupying Afghanistan in the 1980s , had been closed since 1994 when northern militia leader General Abdul Rashid Dostum rebelled against the Kabul government .|||O B-LOC O O O O O O O B-MISC O O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER I-PER O O O B-LOC O O
Witnesses said wrecked tanks and vehicles littered both sides of the heavily-mined road .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Mines had been removed from the road itself , but experts of the Halo Trust mine clearance agency said it would take a week to clear the roadsides .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC I-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Afghan Deputy Prime Minister Qotbuddin Hilal officiated at the reopening ceremony , which was delayed by several hours while the two sides argued about a mutual release of prisoners .|||B-MISC O O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

The shutdown of the 220 KV lines reduced by 500 megawatts ( MW ) the amount of power which the area received from SoCal Edison 's 1,200 MW Sierra hydroelectric facility , he said .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O O O B-LOC O O O O O O

Martin Wolk|||B-PER I-PER
Sierra Semiconductor Corp jumped 23 percent Thursday on the expectation the company would emerge as a smaller but more profitable operation after its planned exit from the computer modem business .|||B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
The San Jose , Calif. , company was up 2-1/8 at 11-3/8 after its announcement Wednesday that it planned to pull out of the highly competitive modem-chip business and focus instead on the fast-growing market for computer networking equipment .|||O B-LOC I-LOC O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
" Certainly the company will be a much smaller company now , but it will be a more profitable business , " said analyst Elias Moosa of Roberston Stephens & Co .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG O
But analysts noted that Sierra still has much painful work ahead of it , including cutting as many as 150 jobs from its workforce , which currently has 500 people , and building up the business of its PMC-Sierra unit , which makes routing devices and chipsets for high-speed computer networks .|||O O O O B-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O
The company has announced plans to take a charge against earnings of $ 50 million to $ 80 million to write down the value of assets and inventories and cover severance payments .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Scott Randall of Soundview Financial Group said the company likely would have difficulty selling its modem-chip business .|||B-PER I-PER O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O
" Once you announce your intention to exit a business , it becomes a complete buyer 's market , " he said .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
And he said that while the company is focusing on the fastest-growing part of its business , the market for networking chips has begun to attract the attention of much-larger players such as International Business Machines Corp .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG O
" As the market develops the question is , are they able to make that transition to be a much larger company ? "|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Randall said .|||B-PER O O
Other analysts were more bullish , even though the company is expected to shrink to slightly more than half its current size in sales .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
" It 's a positive strategic move , " said Miles Kan of Hambrecht & Quist .|||O O O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG O
The company 's PMC-Sierra unit generated $ 33 million of the company 's $ 117 million in sales in the first half of the year , compared with $ 45 million in sales of modem chips , Kan said .|||O O O B-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER O O
But the PMC unit is far more profitable , he said .|||O O B-ORG O O O O O O O O O
Sierra 's stock has fallen from a high of nearly $ 25 this year as the computer chip sector has been battered by falling prices and concern about slowing demand .|||B-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
-- Seattle bureau 206-386-4848|||O B-LOC O O

Shares in Slough , which earlier announced a 14 percent rise in first-half pretax profit to 37.4 million stg , climbed nearly six percent , or 14p to 250 pence at 1009 GMT , while British Land added 12-1 / 2p to 468p , Land Securities rose 5-1 / 2p to 691p and Hammerson was 8p higher at 390 .|||O O B-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O B-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O O B-ORG O O O O O O

We have been very positive ( on property ) , " he said , adding : " On a technical basis it is our most favoured sector . "|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

" On the jet kerosene side we must be cautious about quality .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O
It 's been 99 cents to Korea .|||O O O O O O B-LOC O
" But for normal jet the weakened demand is quite noticeable , the premium is around 45-50 cents .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Another put the premium for jet kerosene at between 65 and 75 cents .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
One trader said despite the fact that some kerosene was in storage at Dubai ports , demand looked to exceed supply in the near term .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O

" On gas oil , in the near term demand and supply are balanced to a bit short , there are some enquiries into east Africa and short covering in India , " said one trader .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O
" The Indians have awarded three cargoes , but the question is whether they will come out for more , " he added .|||O O B-MISC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

" After IOC 's very small purchase of 120,000 tonnes , I 'm still suspicious that they will buy more in the second half of October , " another said .|||O O B-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
But traders see the market remaining tight in the short-term , with some surplus arising closer to October .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
" I see an overhang of gas oil further out , " one said .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
" Gas oil will remain tight in the short term up to mid-September with the premium of around $ 1 for 0.5 percent ( sulphur material ) .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

FEATURE - Rich new detail on U.S. Civil War unearthed .|||O O O O O O B-MISC I-MISC I-MISC O O
Leila Corcoran|||B-PER I-PER
Working in the basement of the National Archives , members of the Civil War Conservation Corps are organising the military records of volunteers who fought for the North so that they can be preserved on microfilm .|||O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O O O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O
The faded documents have been stowed away in the Archives since it opened in 1935 and have rarely seen the light of day .|||O O O O O O O O O B-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Since the project began almost two years ago , corps volunteers have focused on African American troops , preparing records in time for the unveiling in Washington this year of a special memorial to black soldiers who fought in the war .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC I-MISC O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
In one letter , a black soldier heading South wrote his wife , " though great is the present national difficulties yet I look forward to a brighter day when I shall have the oportunity of seeing you in the full enjoyment of freedom .|||O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
" I would like to no ( sic ) if you are still in slavery if you are , it will not be long before we shall have crushed the system that now oppreses you for in the course of three months you shall have your liberty .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Great is the outpouring of the coloured people that is now rallying with the heart of lions against the very curse that has separated you and me . "|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
James is a prisoner for a thoughtless act of folly , while those who have done nothing for the cause are free , " she wrote .|||B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Lincoln 's notation on the letter read : " If his colonel will say in writing on this sheet he is willing to receive this man back to the regiment , I will pardon and send him . "|||B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
The soldier was subsequently pardoned .|||O O O O O O
While the letters speak to the anguish of separation , a photograph of a black amputee speaks to the terrible physical cost of the war .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
In a picture required for his military discharge , Pvt .|||O O O O O O O O O O O
The work on black troops has provided new insight into the rhythms of plantation talk and culture , said John Simon , professor of history at Southern Illinois University at Carbondale and editor of Gen .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG O O O O O
" These ( writings ) are not only poetic but a linguistic treasure trove .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
This is the first generation of African Americans that really can express itself without fear and punishment , " Simon said .|||O O O O O O B-MISC I-MISC O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER O O
" I think there 's probably a whole lot of material that would expand our understanding of the sociology of the war , " said Edward Smith , director of American Studies at American University in Washington .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER O O O B-ORG I-ORG O B-ORG I-ORG O B-LOC O
The war between the North and South raged for nearly four years , claimed the lives of half a million Americans and forever seared the nation 's consciousness .|||O O O O B-LOC O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O O O O O O O
The Civil War Conservation Corps is mostly retirees joined by students during the school year .|||O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O
One soldier was discharged because of " mental incapacity and inebetude ( sic ) of the brain , alleged by the Patient to be connected with a fall on the head but believed to arise from long continued and excessive masturbation . "|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
President Bill Clinton arrived in Chicago on Wednesday as the Democratic convention prepared to re-nominate him for a second four-year term .|||O B-PER I-PER O O B-LOC O O O O B-MISC O O O O O O O O O O O
-DOCSTART-|||O
Sylvie Florence|||B-PER I-PER
Separatist guerrillas planted two bombs overnight at government offices on the French Mediterranean island of Corsica despite fresh warnings of a crackdown by Paris , police said on Thursday .|||O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC B-MISC O O B-LOC O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O
In the latest in a wave of attacks , a two kg ( four lb ) bomb seriously damaged two floors of Agriculture Ministry offices located just 50 metres ( yards ) from a police station in the centre of the island capital Ajaccio .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG O
No one was hurt .|||O O O O O
A second device , packed with five kg ( 10 lbs ) of explosive , was defused before it could go off , police said .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
The new attacks followed by a day a warning of a new " get-tough " policy by Paris toward the separatists , who seek greater autonomy .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O
" On the island , as at the Place Beauvau ( the Interior Ministry 's Paris address ) , people are well aware who is who and who is doing what .|||O O O O O O O O B-LOC I-LOC O O B-ORG I-ORG O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
It is time to end this nightly farce , " said the pro-government daily Le Figaro in an editorial .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O O O O
No one immediately claimed responsibility for Thursday 's incidents , which brought to 23 the number of guerrilla attacks on the resort island since mid-August , when separatist guerrillas ended a shaky seven-month truce .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Corsica has been racked by low-level separatist-inspired violence , principally directed against government targets , for two decades .|||B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
The daily Le Monde reported on Wednesday some separatist movements were considering taking their attacks to the French mainland on the principle that " 300 grammes of explosives on the continent have more impact than 300 kilos in Corsica " .|||O O B-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O

STOCKHOLM 1996-08-29|||B-LOC O

" Together with subsidiaries OMLX , the London Securities & Derivatives Exchange and OM Stockholm , OM Gruppen will open an international electronic bourse for forest products in the first half of 1997 , " OM Gruppen said in a statement .|||O O O O B-ORG O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG O B-ORG I-ORG O B-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O O O O O
PULPEX was the result of a three-year project run in cooperation between OM and representatives of the forest industry , the company said .|||B-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O
Huge swings in the price of pulp over the past few years have made pulp producers ' profitability unpredictable , and made investing in new production capacity a risky business .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
" Without the ability to hedge prices , changes in the world market price for pulp has had an immediate impact on players ' profitability , " OM said .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG O O
It said global production of pulp amounted to around 200 million tonnes per year , of which around 20 percent or 40 million tonnes was sold on the spot market .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
At current prices , the value of this production was around $ 25 billion .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
PULPEX 's clearing operation will be covered by the parent company guarantee issued by OM Gruppen to its wholly-owned bourses and clearing organisations .|||B-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O O O

Looking at market prospects , he said : " I think our best judgment at this stage is that it will probably bumble along in the rather mixed way it 's been in the first half . "|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
" It 's very difficult to predict the market ( trend ) this year .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
It could be better , or it could be worse , " Hope added , echoing the demand uncertainty across automotive industries .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER O O O O O O O O O O
" You can see anxieties in Germany and France , in particular , beginning to grow and develop .|||O O O O O O B-LOC O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O
Against this background , Hope said the group was glad it had rationalised and destocked even though this had pressed margins , which had slipped to 9.5 percent from 11.3 percent a year ago .|||O O O O B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
" I think the figure of 9.5 percent on the first half , when you consider the fact that we 've been destocking , the fairly mixed customer demand , and the fact that we sold the ( southern African ) mines actually is not bad .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O O O O O O
" It does show how easily we should be able to bounce back over 10 percent again , " he added , saying : " We continue to feel very relaxed about our general view that we would average 10 percent profit margins over the cycle . "|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

" When the ( profit ) figures will bounce back up again is just a function of markets recovering just a fraction , " he added .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

Hong Kong Financial Secretary Donald Tsang said on Thursday he expected the territory 's economy to keep growing at around five percent but with some fluctuations from year to year .|||B-LOC I-LOC O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Hong Kong 's economy grew by only 3.1 percent in the first quarter , down from 5.9 percent a year earlier , and some private sector economists have revised downwards their predictions for the 1996 year .|||B-LOC I-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
" Our trend growth rate of five percent in real terms is pretty solid , " Tsang told a news conference after meeting New Zealand Finance Minister Bill Birch .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER O O O O O O B-LOC I-LOC O O B-PER I-PER O

He said inflation was under control and the Hong Kong dollar was " rock solid " .|||O O O O O O O O B-LOC I-LOC O O O O O O O
Its link to the U.S. dollar had proved an engine of growth for the past 12 years .|||O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O
" There 's absolutely no economic or financial or political reason for us to change .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

None of our basic precepts have been challenged . "|||O O O O O O O O O O
Hong Kong will retain its own currency after the handover , run its own financial and monetary policy and have control over its own foreign exchange reserves .|||B-LOC I-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
He described the condition of the property market as " very good indeed " .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
" You know , we went through a little climb and a little trough over the last few years .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Because of speculation in the market we introduced certain measures , but they are not draconian measures , and we brought it down to earth . "|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Tsang said the market would continue to appreciate because property and land were scarce .|||B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
The government would put land on the market to stop rentals " going through the roof " , but this would mean reclamation , with possible environmental problems .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O

South Korea 's Daewoo Corp , unlisted Daewoo Information Systems Co Ltd , Dacom Corp and Dacom International have set up a joint venture to offer telecommunications services in Poland .|||B-LOC I-LOC O B-ORG I-ORG O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG I-ORG O B-ORG I-ORG O B-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC O
Daewoo Dacom Communications ( Poland ) Ltd , which was set up with an initial investment of $ 1.0 million , is expected to have sales of $ 60 million by the year 2000 , a Daewoo statement said on Thursday ..|||B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG O B-LOC O B-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG O O O O O
Daewoo Corp will take a 31 percent stake in the venture , Dacom International 25 percent , Dacom 24 percent , and Daewoo Information 20 percent , the statement said .|||B-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O O O B-ORG O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O O

JAKARTA 1996-08-29|||B-LOC O
Indonesia sought on Thursday to play down a fire bomb attack on a U.S. consulate earlier this week , saying it was being treated as a criminal rather than a political act , the official Antara news agency said .|||B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O
The police are still investigating the incident .|||O O O O O O O O
It is evident the happening is not politically motivated but just an ordinary criminal act , the news agency quoted East Java military commander Major-General Utomo as saying .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC I-MISC O O O B-PER O O O
The Tuesday morning attack on the consulate in Indonesias second largest city of Surabaya , caused slight damage to a guard house before being quickly extinguished , a spokesman at the U.S. embassy in Jakarta , 700 km ( 430 miles ) west of Surabaya , said on Wednesday .|||O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O O
No one was injures , he said .|||O O O O O O O O
Nobody should try and exaggerate it by calling it a bomb because it was just a molotov cocktail , Utomo said .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER O O
He said police were investigating the incident and patrols around diplomatic offices in Surabaya would be stepped up .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O O

HK civil servants contest ban on China panel .|||B-LOC O O O O O B-LOC O O
HONG KONG 1996-08-29|||B-LOC I-LOC O
Senior Hong Kong civil servants were given the go-ahead on Thursday to challenge a government ban on them standing for the Beijing-backed panel to choose the territory 's first post-handover leader and lawmakers .|||O B-LOC I-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O O O O O O O O O O O
The Supreme Court ruled that a judicial hearing contesting the ban would be heard on September 11 , three days before the nomination period for the Selection Committee closes .|||O B-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O O
The government maintains the ban , announced earlier this month , is necessary to avoid a possible conflict of interest because civil servants are involved in determining government policy .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Civil servants argue the ban stymies their political rights .|||O O O O O O O O O O
Hong Kong , a British colony for more than 150 years , will be handed back to China at midnight on June 30 next year .|||B-LOC I-LOC O O B-MISC O O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O
China intends to dismantle the territory 's first fully-elected legislature because it opposes Britain 's recent electoral reforms and install an interim appointed chamber , a decision that has generated considerable controversy .|||B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
It closes on September 14 .|||O O O O O O

VIENNA 1996-08-29|||B-LOC O
Austrian viscose fibre maker Lenzing AG said on Thursday it expected to post negative group results in the second half of the year after posting losses in the first six months .|||B-MISC O O O B-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
" A preview of the second half of 1996 does not reveal any signs of a significant improvement in market conditions , " Lenzing said in a statement released ahead of its earnings conference .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O

Algeria faults Britain over Islamists gathering .|||B-LOC O B-LOC O B-MISC O O
PARIS 1996-08-28|||B-LOC O
The Islamist gathering , due to be held in London on September 8 , has triggered concern and anger in several other Arab countries like Egypt which is also fighting armed Moslem fundamentalists .|||O B-MISC O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O B-LOC O O O O O B-MISC O O
A foreign ministry spokesman said in a statement read on Algerian television that Algeria " has received with concern the information over a meeting of terrorist groups working against the interests of the Arab and Islamic world . "|||O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O B-MISC O O O
" Algeria expresses its sharp rejection of a meeting putting together masterminds and ideologists and financers of terrorism , " the spokesman said , adding the Algerian government has asked the British embassy in Algiers for clarifications .|||O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O O O B-MISC O O B-LOC O O O
The Algerian ambassador in London has also asked for clarification from the Foreign Office over the meeting of Islamist groups .|||O B-MISC O O B-LOC O O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O O O O B-MISC O O
Algeria said " they are clearly working to undermine the stability " of Arab countries .|||B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O
An estimated 50,000 people , including more than 110 foreigners , have been killed in Algeria 's violence pitting Moslem rebels against government forces since early 1992 when authorities in Algeria cancelled a general election in which FIS had taken a commanding lead .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O B-MISC O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC O O O O O O B-ORG O O O O O O

Wall Street ponders Rubin 's role if Clinton wins .|||B-LOC I-LOC O B-PER O O O B-PER O O
Donna Sells|||B-PER I-PER
The outcome of the November elections emerged as a hot topic on Wall Street this week as financial pundits debated whether Robert Rubin might forgo a second term as Treasury secretary if President Clinton is re-elected .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O B-LOC I-LOC O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O B-ORG O O O B-PER O O O
Concern centred on the currency markets since Rubin 's tour de force has been his unflagging support of the dollar .|||O O O O O O O B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O
" Obviously , under the Clinton administration , we 've seen two distinctively different dollar policies , " said Chris Widness , an international economist at Chase Securities Inc. " Under Rubin , the U.S. has certainly looked for a strong dollar . "|||O O O O O B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG O O B-PER O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O
Currently , the dollar stands at about 1.48 marks and 109 yen .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O
" Anyone who would come in there to replace him would have awfully big shoes to fill . "|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Fear that a new Treasury secretary might favour a return to Bentsen-era policy could spell trouble for financial markets .|||O O O O B-ORG O O O O O O B-MISC O O O O O O O O
As for U.S. Treasury securities , Widness explained that Alan Greenspan 's reappointment as chairman of the Federal Reserve and the outlook for the federal budget were more important than whether Rubin continues at the Treasury .|||O O B-ORG I-ORG O O B-PER O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O B-ORG I-ORG O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER O O O B-ORG O
Still , markets may have little to fear from any Rubin successor because the firm dollar policy has yielded positive results .|||O O O O O O O O O O B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O
" And all I can say as a piece of advice is that they 'd better say exactly the same thing ( as Rubin ) , if not stronger , " Perelstein said . "|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER O O O O O O O B-PER O O O
Otherwise , you get selling out of Tokyo and Frankfurt again . "|||O O O O O O O B-LOC O B-LOC O O O

Martin Ayres|||B-PER I-PER
MANCHESTER , England 1996-08-30|||B-LOC O B-LOC O
Felicia Ballanger of France confirmed her status as the world 's number one woman sprinter when she retained her title at the world cycling championships on Friday .|||B-PER I-PER O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Ballanger beat Germany 's Annett Neumann 2-0 in the best-of-three matches final to add the world title to the Olympic gold medal she won in July .|||B-PER O B-LOC O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-MISC O O O O O O O
Russia 's Svetlana Samokhalova fought off a spirited challenge from American Jane Quigley to take the title for a second year .|||B-LOC O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O B-MISC B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O
Russia , the only nation to have two riders in the field , made full use of their numerical superiority .|||B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
Quigley , a former medallist in the points event , led the race at half distance . "|||B-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
The first six riders lapped the field , which left former world champion Ingrid Haringa of the Netherlands down in seventh place despite having the second highest points score .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O B-PER I-PER O O B-LOC O O O O O O O O O O O O

French central defender Antoine Kombouare has completed a 300,000 pounds sterling ( $ 467,000 ) move to Aberdeen from Swiss club Sion , the Scottish premier division club said on Friday .|||B-MISC O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O O O O O O O O B-ORG O B-MISC O B-ORG O O B-MISC O O O O O O O

" I have been watching him for several weeks now and have no doubts he brings real quality to the side .|||O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O O
The 32-year-old defender played seven seasons with Nantes and was with Paris St Germain for five seasons .|||O O O O O O O B-ORG O O O B-ORG I-ORG I-ORG O O O O
He said former PSG team mate David Ginola , who now plays for English premier league Newcastle , was influential in his move to Scotland .|||O O O B-ORG O O B-PER I-PER O O O O O B-MISC O O B-ORG O O O O O O O B-LOC O
